15053146Di2015UniqueSeparatorCREATE FUNCTION dbo.Split Di2015NewLine   (  @Delimiter varchar(5), Di2015NewLine      @List      varchar(8000)Di2015NewLine   ) Di2015NewLine   RETURNS @TableOfValues table Di2015NewLine      (  RowID   smallint IDENTITY(1,1), Di2015NewLine         [Value] varchar(50) Di2015NewLine      ) Di2015NewLineAS Di2015NewLine   BEGINDi2015NewLine      DECLARE @LenString int Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      WHILE len( @List ) > 0 Di2015NewLine         BEGIN Di2015NewLine            SELECT @LenString = Di2015NewLine               (CASE charindex( @Delimiter, @List ) Di2015NewLine                   WHEN 0 THEN len( @List ) Di2015NewLine                   ELSE ( charindex( @Delimiter, @List ) -1 )Di2015NewLine                ENDDi2015NewLine               ) Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            INSERT INTO @TableOfValues Di2015NewLine               SELECT substring( @List, 1, @LenString )Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            SELECT @List = Di2015NewLine               (CASE ( len( @List ) - @LenString ) Di2015NewLine                   WHEN 0 THEN '' Di2015NewLine                   ELSE right( @List, len( @List ) - @LenString - 1 ) Di2015NewLine                ENDDi2015NewLine               ) Di2015NewLine         ENDDi2015NewLine      RETURN Di2015NewLine    END Di2015NewLine

Newtonsoft.Json;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass SecureJsonSerializer<T>Di2015NewLine    where T : classDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly string filePath;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine password";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static readonly byte[] passwordBytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(Password);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public SecureJsonSerializer(string filePath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.filePath = filePath;Di2015NewLine        var rmCrypto = GetAlgorithm();Di2015NewLine        this.encryptor = rmCrypto.CreateEncryptor();Di2015NewLine        this.decryptor = rmCrypto.CreateDecryptor();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static RijndaelManaged GetAlgorithm()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var algorithm = new RijndaelManaged();Di2015NewLine        int bytesForKey = algorithm.KeySize / 8;Di2015NewLine        int bytesForIV = algorithm.BlockSize / 8;Di2015NewLine        algorithm.Key = key.GetBytes(bytesForKey);Di2015NewLine        algorithm.IV = key.GetBytes(bytesForIV);Di2015NewLine        return algorithm;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Save(T obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var writer = new StreamWriter(new CryptoStream(File.Create(this.filePath), this.encryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Write)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            writer.Write(JsonConvert.SerializeObject(obj));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T Load()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (this.CanLoad)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (var reader = new StreamReader(new CryptoStream(File.OpenRead(this.filePath), this.decryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Read)))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return JsonConvert.DeserializeObject<T>(reader.ReadToEnd());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15058659Di2015UniqueSeparator        SecureString password = new SecureString();Di2015NewLine        string runasUsername = "USERNAME";Di2015NewLine        string runasPassword = "PASSWORD";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string liveIdconnectionUri = "http://EXCHANGE_SERVER/PowerShell";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (char x in runasPassword)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            password.AppendChar(x);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        PSCredential credential = new PSCredential(runasUsername, password);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Set the connection InfoDi2015NewLine        WSManConnectionInfo connectionInfo = new WSManConnectionInfo((new Uri(liveIdconnectionUri)), "http://schemas.microsoft.com/powershell/Microsoft.Exchange",Di2015NewLine        credential);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        connectionInfo.AuthenticationMechanism = AuthenticationMechanism.Default; //AuthenticationMechanism.Default;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // create a runspace on a remote pathDi2015NewLine        // the returned instance must be of type RemoteRunspaceDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Runspace runspace = RunspaceFactory.CreateRunspace(connectionInfo);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        PowerShell powershell = PowerShell.Create();Di2015NewLine        PSCommand command = new PSCommand();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        command.AddCommand("Enable-Mailbox");Di2015NewLine        command.AddParameter("Identity", "MAIL_USER_ID_HERE");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        powershell.Commands = command;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // open the remote runspaceDi2015NewLine            runspace.Open();Di2015NewLine            // associate the runspace with powershellDi2015NewLine            powershell.Runspace = runspace;Di2015NewLine            // invoke the powershell to obtain the resultsDi2015NewLine            var result = powershell.Invoke();Di2015NewLine            if (result.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("sucessful!");Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("failed!");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(ex.Message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // dispose the runspace and enable garbage collectionDi2015NewLine            runspace.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            runspace = null;Di2015NewLine            // Finally dispose the powershell and set all variables to null to freeDi2015NewLine            // up any resources.Di2015NewLine            powershell.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            powershell = null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("done");Di2015NewLine        Console.Read();Di2015NewLine

15068957Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic string Concatenate(string[] strings, int maxLength, string separator)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var totalLength = strings.Sum(s => s.Length);Di2015NewLine    var requiredLength = totalLength - (strings.Length - 1)*separator.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Return if there is enough place.Di2015NewLine    if (requiredLength <= maxLength)Di2015NewLine        return String.Concat(strings.Take(strings.Length - 1).Select(s => s + separator).Concat(new[] {strings.Last()}));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The problem...Di2015NewLine    var helpers = new ConcatenateInternal[strings.Length];Di2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < helpers.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        helpers[i] = new ConcatenateInternal(strings[i].Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var avaliableLength = maxLength - (strings.Length - 1)*separator.Length;Di2015NewLine    var charsInserted = 0;Di2015NewLine    var currentIndex = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (charsInserted != avaliableLength)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i < strings.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (charsInserted == avaliableLength)Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (currentIndex >= strings[i].Length)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                helpers[i].Finished = true;Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            helpers[i].StringBuilder.Append(strings[i][currentIndex]);Di2015NewLine            charsInserted++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        currentIndex++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var unified = new StringBuilder(avaliableLength);Di2015NewLine    for (var i = 0; i < strings.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!helpers[i].Finished)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            unified.Append(helpers[i].StringBuilder.ToString(0, helpers[i].StringBuilder.Length - 3));Di2015NewLine            unified.Append("...");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            unified.Append(helpers[i].StringBuilder.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (i < strings.Length - 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            unified.Append(separator);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return unified.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15068957Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ConcatenateInternalDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public StringBuilder StringBuilder { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public bool Finished { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ConcatenateInternal(int capacity)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder = new StringBuilder(capacity);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15070220Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading.Tasks;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace DemoDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            AutoResetEvent[] events = new AutoResetEvent[32];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < events.Length; ++i)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                events[i] = new AutoResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Set the first 16 auto reset events before calling CancelableWaitAll().Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < 16; ++i)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                events[i].Set();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Start a thread that waits five seconds and then sets the rest of the events.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Task.Factory.StartNew(() => setEvents(events));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Waiting for all events to be set.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ManualResetEvent stopper = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine            CancelableWaitAll(events, stopper);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Waited.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void setEvents(AutoResetEvent[] events)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(5000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 16; i < events.Length; ++i)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                events[i].Set();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static bool CancelableWaitAll(WaitHandle[] waitHandles, WaitHandle cancelWaitHandle)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var waitHandleList = new List<WaitHandle>();Di2015NewLine            waitHandleList.Add(cancelWaitHandle);Di2015NewLine            waitHandleList.AddRange(waitHandles);Di2015NewLine            int handleIdx;Di2015NewLine            doDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                handleIdx = WaitHandle.WaitAny(waitHandleList.ToArray());Di2015NewLine                waitHandleList.RemoveAt(handleIdx);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            while (waitHandleList.Count > 1 && handleIdx != 0);Di2015NewLine            return handleIdx != 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15070826Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class EntityLookupAttribute : ActionFilterAttributeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override void OnActionExecuting(ActionExecutingContext filterContext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // retrieve the id parameter from the RouteDataDi2015NewLine        var id = filterContext.HttpContext.Request.RequestContext.RouteData.Values["id"] as string;Di2015NewLine        if (id == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // There was no id present in the request, no need to execute the actionDi2015NewLine            filterContext.Result = new HttpNotFoundResult();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // we've got an id, let's query the database:Di2015NewLine        var entity = db.Entities.Find(id);Di2015NewLine        if (entity == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // The entity with the specified id was not found in the databaseDi2015NewLine            filterContext.Result = new HttpNotFoundResult();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // We found the entity => we could associate it to the action parameterDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // let's first get the name of the action parameter whose type matchesDi2015NewLine        // the entity type we've just found. There should be one and exactlyDi2015NewLine        // one action argument that matches this query, otherwise you have a Di2015NewLine        // problem with your action signature and we'd better fail quickly hereDi2015NewLine        string paramName = filterContextDi2015NewLine            .ActionDescriptorDi2015NewLine            .GetParameters()Di2015NewLine            .Single(x => x.ParameterType == entity.GetType())Di2015NewLine            .ParameterName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // and now let's set its value to the entityDi2015NewLine        filterContext.ActionParameters[paramName] = entity;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15070826Di2015UniqueSeparator[EntityLookup]Di2015NewLinepublic ActionResult Edit(Entity entity)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // if we got that far the entity was foundDi2015NewLine    return View(entity);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

"(No customers)" : c.CompanyName,Di2015NewLine            SupplierName = x.sup.Name   Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine

15070956Di2015UniqueSeparator   private static Message Transform(Message oldMessage)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //load the old message into XMLDi2015NewLine        var msgbuf = oldMessage.CreateBufferedCopy(int.MaxValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var tmpMessage = msgbuf.CreateMessage();Di2015NewLine        var xdr = tmpMessage.GetReaderAtBodyContents();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var xdoc = new XmlDocument();Di2015NewLine        xdoc.Load(xdr);Di2015NewLine        xdr.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // We are making an assumption that the Operation element is theDi2015NewLine        // first child element of the Body elementDi2015NewLine        var targetNodes = xdoc.SelectNodes("./*");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // There should be only one Operation elementDi2015NewLine        var node = (null != targetNodes) ? targetNodes[0] : null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (null != node)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(null != node.Attributes) node.Attributes.RemoveNamedItem("xmlns");Di2015NewLine            node.Prefix = "bb";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var ms = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine        var xw = XmlWriter.Create(ms);Di2015NewLine        xdoc.Save(xw);Di2015NewLine        xw.Flush();Di2015NewLine        xw.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ms.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine        var xr = XmlReader.Create(ms);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //create new message from modified XML documentDi2015NewLine        var newMessage = Message.CreateMessage(oldMessage.Version, null, xr);Di2015NewLine        newMessage.Headers.CopyHeadersFrom(oldMessage);Di2015NewLine        newMessage.Properties.CopyProperties(oldMessage.Properties);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return newMessage;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15072437Di2015UniqueSeparator    private List<string> Process(IEnumerable<string> input)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<string> data = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        int preExpandCount = 0, offset = 0;Di2015NewLine        foreach (string inputItem in input)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<string> splitItems = inputItem.Split(',').ToList();Di2015NewLine            if (data.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                preExpandCount = ExpandList(data, splitItems.Count - 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            offset = 0;Di2015NewLine            foreach (string splitItem in splitItems)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (preExpandCount == 0)Di2015NewLine                    data.Add(splitItem);Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    for (int i = 0; i < preExpandCount; i++)Di2015NewLine                        data[i + offset] = String.Format("{0},{1}", data[i + offset], splitItem);Di2015NewLine                    offset += preExpandCount;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return data.OrderBy(e => e).ToList();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private int ExpandList(List<string> existing, int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int existingCount = existing.Count;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)Di2015NewLine            existing.AddRange(existing.Take(existingCount).ToList());Di2015NewLine        return existingCount;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

{Di2015NewLine        public static CubicAddress Transform(long linearAddress, CubicAddress geometry) {Di2015NewLine            var cubicAddress=new CubicAddress();Di2015NewLine            var sectorsPerCylinder=geometry.Sector*geometry.Head;Di2015NewLine            long remainder;Di2015NewLine            cubicAddress.Cylinder=Math.DivRem(linearAddress, sectorsPerCylinder, out remainder);Di2015NewLine            cubicAddress.Head=(uint)Math.DivRem(remainder, geometry.Sector, out remainder);Di2015NewLine            cubicAddress.Sector=1+(uint)remainder;Di2015NewLine            return cubicAddress;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public virtual long Cylinder {Di2015NewLine            get;Di2015NewLine            set;Di2015NewLine      internal static void ThrowIfDiskSizeOutOfIntegrity(long remainder) {Di2015NewLine            if(0!=remainder) {Di2015NewLine                var message="DiskSize is not an integral multiple of a sector size";Di2015NewLine                throw new ArithmeticException(message);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static DiskGeometry      var x=new DISK_GEOMETRY_EX();Di2015NewLine            IoCtl.Execute(ref x, IoCtl.DISK_GET_DRIVE_GEOMETRY_EX, deviceName);Di2015NewLine            m_DiskSize=x.DiskSize;Di2015NewLine            m_Geometry=x.Geometry;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            long remainder;Di2015NewLine            m_MaximumLinearAddress=Math.DivRem(DiskSize, BytesPerSector, out remainder)-1;Di2015NewLine            ThrowIfDiskSizeOutOfIntegrity(remainder);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            m_BytesPerCylinder=BytesPerSector*Sector*Head;Di2015NewLine            m_MaximumCubicAddress=DiskGeometry.Transform(m_MaximumLinearAddress, this);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15077606Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class DivMulAddMultiConverter : IMultiValueConverterDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        #region Implementation of IMultiValueConverterDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public object Convert(object[] values, Type targetType, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (targetType != typeof(double)) throw new ArgumentException("Expected a target type of Double", "targetType");Di2015NewLine            if (values == null || values.Length <= 0) return 0.0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var cur = System.Convert.ToDouble(values[0]);Di2015NewLine            if(values.Length > 1)Di2015NewLine                cur /= System.Convert.ToDouble(values[1]);Di2015NewLine            if(values.Length > 2)Di2015NewLine                cur *= System.Convert.ToDouble(values[2]);Di2015NewLine            for(int i = 3; i < values.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                cur += System.Convert.ToDouble(values[i]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return cur;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public object[] ConvertBack(object value, Type[] targetTypes, object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

15078685Di2015UniqueSeparator    void PutMessages()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // mq propertiesDi2015NewLine            properties = new Hashtable();Di2015NewLine            properties.Add(MQC.TRANSPORT_PROPERTY, MQC.TRANSPORT_MQSERIES_MANAGED);Di2015NewLine            properties.Add(MQC.HOST_NAME_PROPERTY, hostName);Di2015NewLine            properties.Add(MQC.PORT_PROPERTY, port);Di2015NewLine            properties.Add(MQC.CHANNEL_PROPERTY, channelName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // display all detailsDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("MQ Parameters");Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("1) queueName = " + queueName);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("2) host = " + hostName);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("3) port = " + port);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("4) channel = " + channelName);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("5) numberOfMsgs = " + numberOfMsgs);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // create connectionDi2015NewLine            Console.Write("Connecting to queue manager.. ");Di2015NewLine            queueManager = new MQQueueManager(queueManagerName, properties);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("done");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // accessing queueDi2015NewLine            Console.Write("Accessing queue " + queueName + ".. ");Di2015NewLine            queue = queueManager.AccessQueue(queueName, MQC.MQOO_OUTPUT + MQC.MQOO_FAIL_IF_QUIESCING);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("done");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // creating a message objectDi2015NewLine            message = new MQMessage();Di2015NewLine            message.WriteString(messageString);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // putting messages continuouslyDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 1; i <= numberOfMsgs; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.Write("Message " + i + " <" + messageString + ">.. ");Di2015NewLine                queue.Put(message);Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("put");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // closing queueDi2015NewLine            Console.Write("Closing queue.. ");Di2015NewLine            queue.Close();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("done");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // disconnecting queue managerDi2015NewLine            Console.Write("Disconnecting queue manager.. ");Di2015NewLine            queueManager.Disconnect();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("done");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        catch (MQException mqe)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("");Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("MQException caught: {0} - {1}", mqe.ReasonCode, mqe.Message);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(mqe.StackTrace);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

15079399Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static DateTime AddDuration(this DateTime datetime, string str)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int value = 0;Di2015NewLine        int mutiplier = str.EndsWith("d") ? 1440 : str.EndsWith("h") ?  60 : 1;Di2015NewLine        if (int.TryParse(str.TrimEnd(new char[]{'m','h','d'}), out value))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return datetime.AddMinutes(value * mutiplier);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return datetime;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

15089598Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<double> TopNSorted(this IEnumerable<double> source, int n)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<double> top = new List<double>(n + 1);Di2015NewLine    using (var e = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (e.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine                top.Add(e.Current);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException("Not enough elements");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        top.Sort();Di2015NewLine        while (e.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double c = e.Current;Di2015NewLine            int index = top.BinarySearch(c);Di2015NewLine            if (index < 0) index = ~index;Di2015NewLine            if (index < n)                    // if (index != 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                top.Insert(index, c);Di2015NewLine                top.RemoveAt(n);              // top.RemoveAt(0)Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return top;  // return ((IEnumerable<double>)top).Reverse();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15093349Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic sealed class SafeCache<T> {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly ReaderWriterLockSlim rwLock = new ReaderWriterLockSlim(LockRecursionPolicy.SupportsRecursion);Di2015NewLine    private readonly Func<T> expensiveReader;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly TimeSpan lease;Di2015NewLine    private DateTime lastRead;Di2015NewLine    private T data;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public SafeCache(TimeSpan lease, Func<T> expensiveReader) {Di2015NewLine        this.lease = lease;Di2015NewLine        this.expensiveReader = expensiveReader;Di2015NewLine        this.data = expensiveReader();Di2015NewLine        this.lastRead = DateTime.UtcNow;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T Data {Di2015NewLine        get {Di2015NewLine            this.rwLock.EnterReadLock();Di2015NewLine            try {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (DateTime.UtcNow - this.lastRead < this.lease)Di2015NewLine                    return this.data;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            } finally {Di2015NewLine                this.rwLock.ExitReadLock();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            this.rwLock.EnterUpgradeableReadLock();Di2015NewLine            try {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (DateTime.UtcNow - this.lastRead < this.lease)Di2015NewLine                    return this.data;Di2015NewLine                else {Di2015NewLine                    this.rwLock.EnterWriteLock();Di2015NewLine                    try {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        this.data = expensiveReader();Di2015NewLine                        this.lastRead = DateTime.UtcNow;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        return this.data;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    } finally {Di2015NewLine                        this.rwLock.ExitWriteLock();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            } finally {Di2015NewLine                this.rwLock.ExitUpgradeableReadLock();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15093349Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Global : System.Web.HttpApplication {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected void Application_Start(object sender, EventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine        HttpContext.Current.Application["SOME_KEY"] = new SafeCache<SomeRecord[]> (Di2015NewLine          lease: TimeSpan.FromMinutes(10),Di2015NewLine          expensiveReader: () => {Di2015NewLine             // .. read the database hereDi2015NewLine             // and return a SomeRecord[]Di2015NewLine             // (this code will be executed for the first time by the ctor of SafeCacheDi2015NewLine             // and later on, with every invocation of the .Data property getter that discovers Di2015NewLine             // that 10 minutes have passed since the last refresh)Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLine        // .. etcDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

15093422Di2015UniqueSeparator//WORKING CODE NOWDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//JAVASCRIPT CODEDi2015NewLinefunction dot2num(dot) {Di2015NewLine    var d = dot.split('.');Di2015NewLine    return ((((((+d[0])*256)+(+d[1]))*256)+(+d[2]))*256)+(+d[3]);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//C# CODE SERVER SIDEDi2015NewLinefunction dot2num(dot)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   var ip = IPAddress.Parse(args.Value);Di2015NewLine   var ipBytes = ip.GetAddressBytes();Di2015NewLine   double ipAddress = ipBytes[0] * Math.Pow(256, 3) + ipBytes[1] * Math.Pow(256, 2) + ipBytes[2] * Math.Pow(256, 1) + ipBytes[3];Di2015NewLine   return ipAddress;   Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15098242Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int BinarySearch<TSource, TKey>(this IList<TSource> collectionDi2015NewLine    , TKey item, Func<TSource, TKey> selector, Comparer<TKey> comparer = null)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return BinarySearch(collection, item, selector, comparer, 0, collection.Count);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineprivate static int BinarySearch<TSource, TKey>(this IList<TSource> collectionDi2015NewLine    , TKey item, Func<TSource, TKey> selector, Comparer<TKey> comparerDi2015NewLine    , int startIndex, int endIndex)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    comparer = comparer ?? Comparer<TKey>.Default;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (startIndex == endIndex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return startIndex;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int testIndex = startIndex + ((endIndex - startIndex) / 2);Di2015NewLine        int comparision = comparer.Compare(selector(collection[testIndex]), item);Di2015NewLine        if (comparision > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            endIndex = testIndex;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (comparision == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return testIndex;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            startIndex = testIndex + 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15104163Di2015UniqueSeparator// Helper method to count set bits in an integerDi2015NewLinepublic static int CountBits(int n)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int count = 0;Di2015NewLine    while (n != 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        count++;Di2015NewLine        n &= (n - 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return count;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> PowerSet<T>(Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<T> src, Di2015NewLine    int minSetSize = 0, Di2015NewLine    int maxSetSize = int.MaxValue)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // we want fast random access to the source, so we'llDi2015NewLine    // need to ToArray() itDi2015NewLine    var cached = src.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    var setSize = Math.Pow(2, cached.Length);Di2015NewLine    for(int i=0; i < setSize; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var subSetSize = CountBits(i);Di2015NewLine        if(subSetSize < minSetSize || Di2015NewLine           subSetSize > maxSetSize)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        T[] set = new T[subSetSize];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var temp = i;Di2015NewLine        var srcIdx = 0;Di2015NewLine        var dstIdx = 0;Di2015NewLine        while(temp > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if((temp & 0x01) == 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                set[dstIdx++] = cached[srcIdx];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            temp >>= 1;Di2015NewLine            srcIdx++;            Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        yield return set;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    yield break;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15104163Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var src = "ABCDEF";Di2015NewLine    var combos = PowerSet(src, 3, 6);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // hairy joins for great prettinessDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(Di2015NewLine        string.Join(" , ", Di2015NewLine            combos.Select(subset => Di2015NewLine                string.Concat("[", Di2015NewLine                    string.Join(",", subset) , "]")))Di2015NewLine    );Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15104808Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Bitmap MakeGrayscale3(Bitmap original)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   //create a blank bitmap the same size as originalDi2015NewLine   Bitmap newBitmap = new Bitmap(original.Width, original.Height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //get a graphics object from the new imageDi2015NewLine   Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage(newBitmap);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //create the grayscale ColorMatrixDi2015NewLine   ColorMatrix colorMatrix = new ColorMatrix(Di2015NewLine      new float[][] Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         new float[] {.3f, .3f, .3f, 0, 0},Di2015NewLine         new float[] {.59f, .59f, .59f, 0, 0},Di2015NewLine         new float[] {.11f, .11f, .11f, 0, 0},Di2015NewLine         new float[] {0, 0, 0, 1, 0},Di2015NewLine         new float[] {0, 0, 0, 0, 1}Di2015NewLine      });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //create some image attributesDi2015NewLine   ImageAttributes attributes = new ImageAttributes();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //set the color matrix attributeDi2015NewLine   attributes.SetColorMatrix(colorMatrix);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //draw the original image on the new imageDi2015NewLine   //using the grayscale color matrixDi2015NewLine   g.DrawImage(original, new Rectangle(0, 0, original.Width, original.Height),Di2015NewLine      0, 0, original.Width, original.Height, GraphicsUnit.Pixel, attributes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   //dispose the Graphics objectDi2015NewLine   g.Dispose();Di2015NewLine   return newBitmap;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15108167Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Dictionary<String, String> ConvertAnyToDictionary<T>(T value) where T : class {Di2015NewLine    var fields = typeof(T).GetFields();Di2015NewLine    var properties = typeof(T).GetProperties();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var dict1 = fields.ToDictionary(x => x.Name, x => x.GetValue(value).ToString());Di2015NewLine    var dict2 = properties.ToDictionary(x => x.Name, x => x.GetValue(value, null).ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return dict1.Union(dict2).ToDictionary(x => x.Key, x=> x.Value);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15116821Di2015UniqueSeparatorCREATE OR REPLACE TYPE tab_number IS TABLE OF NUMBER;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION reserve_jobs RETURN tab_number ISDi2015NewLine   CURSOR c IS Di2015NewLine      SELECT id FROM IMPORTJOBS WHERE STATUS = 'REGISTERED'Di2015NewLine      FOR UPDATE SKIP LOCKED;Di2015NewLine   l_result tab_number := tab_number();Di2015NewLine   l_id number;Di2015NewLineBEGINDi2015NewLine   OPEN c;Di2015NewLine   FOR i IN 1..10 LOOPDi2015NewLine      FETCH c INTO l_id;Di2015NewLine      EXIT WHEN c%NOTFOUND;Di2015NewLine      l_result.extend;Di2015NewLine      l_result(l_result.size) := l_id;Di2015NewLine   END LOOP;Di2015NewLine   CLOSE c;Di2015NewLine   RETURN l_result;Di2015NewLineEND;Di2015NewLine

15116875Di2015UniqueSeparator<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0">Di2015NewLine    <xsl:output method="xml" encoding="UTF-8" indent="yes"/>Di2015NewLine    <!-- special thanks to: Pablo Pozo -->Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    <xsl:variable name="attributeMap"Di2015NewLine                  select="'|font-size,FontSize|font-name,FontFamily|enabled,isEnabled|forecolor,Foreground|id,name|TabStop,IsTabStop|TabIndex,isTabIndex|dock,DockPanel.Dock|width,Width|height,Height|'" />Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    <!--                        -->Di2015NewLine    <!-- Default processing     -->Di2015NewLine    <!--                        -->Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    <!-- Ignore attributes by default, so we can have more controlDi2015NewLine         about unhandled attributes -->Di2015NewLine    <xsl:template match="@*|*" />Di2015NewLine    <xsl:template match="node()|@*" mode="to-attr"/>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    <!-- Default attribute processing -->Di2015NewLine    <xsl:template name="process-element">Di2015NewLine        <xsl:param name="attr" />Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        <!-- Process all attributes and elements which are going to beDi2015NewLine             transformed to attributes -->Di2015NewLine        <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|*" mode="to-attr" />Di2015NewLine        <!-- Add extra attribute -->Di2015NewLine        <xsl:if test="$attr">Di2015NewLine            <xsl:attribute name="{substring-after($attr, '|')}">Di2015NewLine                <xsl:value-of select="@*[local-name() = substring-before($attr, '|')]" />Di2015NewLine            </xsl:attribute>Di2015NewLine        </xsl:if>Di2015NewLine        <!-- Process children elements -->Di2015NewLine        <xsl:apply-templates select="*" />Di2015NewLine    </xsl:template>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    <!--                        -->Di2015NewLine    <!-- Control transformations-->Di2015NewLine    <!--                        -->Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    <!-- Transform PanelWrapper to WrapPannel -->Di2015NewLine    <xsl:template match="PanelWrapper">Di2015NewLine        <WrapPanel>Di2015NewLine            <xsl:call-template name="process-element" />Di2015NewLine        </WrapPanel>Di2015NewLine    </xsl:template>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    <!-- Exclude attributes for PanelWrapper -->Di2015NewLine    <xsl:template match="PanelWrapper/@forecolor|PanelWrapper/@font-name|PanelWrapper/@font-size|PanelWrapper/@font-style"Di2015NewLine                  mode="to-attr" />Di2015NewLine    <!-- TODO: Exclude doesn't work for the following attributes -->Di2015NewLine    <xsl:template match="PanelWrapper/@border-left|PanelWrapper/@border-top|PanelWrapper/@border-right|PanelWrapper/@border-bottom"Di2015NewLine 15119085Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class FooDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Context;Di2015NewLine    public string Data;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class BarDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Context;Di2015NewLine    public string Data;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<TOutput> JoinTwoModels<T1, T2, TIdent, TOutput>(Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<T1> sourceA,Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<T2> sourceB,Di2015NewLine    Func<T1, TIdent> idSelectorA,Di2015NewLine    Func<T2, TIdent> idSelectorB,Di2015NewLine .Where(y => quearyA.Select(x => x.Id).Contains(y.Id))Di2015NewLine            .Select(y => y.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return quearyA.Select(x => x.Value).Concat(quearyB);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var sourceA = new List<Foo>() {new Foo() {Context = 2, Data = "I'm a Foo"}};Di2015NewLine    var sourceB = new List<Bar>() {new Bar() {Context = 2, Data = "I'm a Bar"}};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var Output1 = sourceA.AsQueryable();Di2015NewLine    var x.Context),Di2015NewLine        (Func<Bar, int>) (x => x.Context),Di2015NewLine        (Func<Foo, string>) (x => x.Data),Di2015NewLine        (Func<Bar, string>) (x => x.Data));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var item in results)Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(item);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15121538Di2015UniqueSeparatorconst int MaxThreads = 4;Di2015NewLineconst int ItemsToProcess = 10000;Di2015NewLineprivate Semaphore _sem = new Semaphore(MaxThreads, MaxThreads);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid DoTheWork()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int s = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < ItemsToProcess; ++i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _sem.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine        Data d = new Data();Di2015NewLine        d.Pos = s;Di2015NewLine        d.Num = i;Di2015NewLine        ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem(Process, d);Di2015NewLine        ++s;Di2015NewLine        if (s >= 19)Di2015NewLine            s = 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // All items have been assigned threads.Di2015NewLine    // Now, acquire the semaphore "MaxThreads" times.Di2015NewLine    // When counter reaches that number, we know all threads are done.Di2015NewLine    int semCount = 0;Di2015NewLine    while (semCount < MaxThreads)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _sem.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine        ++semCount;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // All items are processedDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Clear the semaphore for next time.Di2015NewLine    _sem.Release(semCount);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid Process(object o)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // do the processing ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // release the semaphoreDi2015NewLine    _sem.Release();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15121815Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate IEnumerable<LineMatch> ScanDocuments2()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string[] keywordtext = txtKeywords.Lines;Di2015NewLine    string[] patterntext = txtPatterns.Lines;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Regex searchPattern = GetSearchPattern();Di2015NewLine    var keywords = GetKeywords(keywordtext).ToList();Di2015NewLine    var patterns = GetPatterns(patterntext).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var files = GetFiles(searchPattern);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var lines = files.Aggregate(Di2015NewLine               new List<LineMatch>(),Di2015NewLine               (accumulator, file) =>Di2015NewLine               {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach(var item in EnumerateFile(file, keywords, patterns))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                  accumulator.Add(item);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                   return accumulator;Di2015NewLine               },Di2015NewLine               accumulator => accumulatorDi2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLine        return lines;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine PathEx)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(PathEx.Message);Di2015NewLine        throw;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate LineMatch EnumerateFile(string file, IEnumerable<string> keywords, IEnumerable<Regex> patterns)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var counter = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  foreach(var line in File.ReadLines(file))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var matchingRegex = patterns.FirstOrDefault(p => p.IsMatch(line));Di2015NewLine    var keyword = keywords.FirstOrDefault(k => line.ToLower().Contains(k.ToLower()));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if(keyword == null && matchingRegex == null) continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string tmpfile = file.Replace(txtSelectedDirectory.Text, "..");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    yield return new LineMatchDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Counter = counter,Di2015NewLine        File = tmpfile,Di2015NewLine        Line = line,Di2015NewLine        Pattern = matchingRegex == null ? null : matchingRegex.Pattern,Di2015NewLine        Keyword = keywordDi2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    counter++;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate IEnumerable<string> GetFiles(Regex searchPattern)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  return    yield return keyword;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate IEnumerable<string> GetPatterns(IEnumerable<string> patterntext)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  foreach(var pattern }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate Regex GetSearchPattern()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  return new Regex(string.Format(@"$(?<=\\.({0}))",  txtFilePattern.Text), 15122231Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<T> Shuffle<T>(this List<T> listToShuffle)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //make a new list of the wanted typeDi2015NewLine            List<T> newList = new List<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //while there are still items in our listDi2015NewLine            while (listToShuffle.Count >= 33)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //get a random number within the listDi2015NewLine                int index = _rnd.Next(listToShuffle.Count);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //add the item at that position to the new listDi2015NewLine                newList.Add(listToShuffle[index]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //and remove it from the old listDi2015NewLine                listToShuffle.RemoveAt(index);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //then copy all the items back in the old list againDi2015NewLine            listToShuffle.AddRange(newList);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return newList;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

15124120Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// This holds the number and names of the subcategories that are required for each category. Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinestring[] subCategories = new string[3] { "Critical Down Time", "Critical Outage", "Total Repair Time" };Di2015NewLinestring categoryPrevious = null;Di2015NewLinestring categoryCurrent = null;Di2015NewLineint subCategoryOccurences = 0;Di2015NewLineint rowCount = 0;Di2015NewLineDataRow rowFiller = null;Di2015NewLine
15124120Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void PrepareDataTable(DataTable dtResults)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (dtResults == null || dtResults.Rows.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //initialize categoryDi2015NewLine    categoryPrevious = dtResults.Rows[0]["Category"].ToString();Di2015NewLine    doDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //get the current categoryDi2015NewLine        categoryCurrent = dtResults.Rows[rowCount]["Category"].ToString();Di2015NewLine        //check if this is a new category. this is where all the work is doneDi2015NewLine        if (categoryCurrent != categoryPrevious)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //check if we have fulfilled the requirement for number of subcategories Di2015NewLine            CheckSubCategoryRequirements(dtResults);Di2015NewLine            //at this point we have fulfilled the requirement for number of subcategories Di2015NewLine            //add blank (separator) rowDi2015NewLine            dtResults.Rows.InsertAt(dtResults.NewRow(), rowCount);Di2015NewLine            rowCount++;Di2015NewLine            //reset the number of subcategoriesDi2015NewLine            subCategoryOccurences = 0;Di2015NewLine            categoryPrevious = categoryCurrent;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            rowCount++;Di2015NewLine            categoryOccurences++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    } while (rowCount < dtResults.Rows.Count);Di2015NewLine    //check sub category requirements for the last categoryDi2015NewLine    CheckSubCategoryRequirements(dtResults);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15124120Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Checks if a category has fulfilled the requirements for # of sub categories and adds the missing sub categories, if neededDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLineprivate void CheckSubCategoryRequirements(DataTable dtResults)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (subCategoryOccurences< subCategories.Length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //we need to add rows for the missing subcategoriesDi2015NewLine        while (subCategoryOccurences< subCategories.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //create a new row and populate category and subcategory infoDi2015NewLine            rowFiller = dtResults.NewRow();Di2015NewLine            rowFiller["Category"] = categoryPrevious;Di2015NewLine            rowFiller["SubCategory"] = subCategories[subCategoryOccurences];Di2015NewLine            //insert the new row into the current location of table Di2015NewLine            dtResults.Rows.InsertAt(rowFiller, rowCount);Di2015NewLine            subCategoryOccurences++;Di2015NewLine            rowCount++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15124120Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void RunTest()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    DataTable dtResults = new DataTable();Di2015NewLine    dtResults.Columns.Add("Category");Di2015NewLine    dtResults.Columns.Add("SubCategory");Di2015NewLine    dtResults.Rows.Add("XXXX", "Critical Down Time");Di2015NewLine    dtResults.Rows.Add("XXXX", "Critical Outage");Di2015NewLine    dtResults.Rows.Add("XXXX", "Total Repair Time");Di2015NewLine    dtResults.Rows.Add("YYYY", "Critical Down Time");Di2015NewLine    dtResults.Rows.Add("YYYY", "Critical Outage");Di2015NewLine    dtResults.Rows.Add("ZZZZ", "Critical Down Time");Di2015NewLine    dtResults.Rows.Add("ZZZZ", "Critical Outage");Di2015NewLine    dtResults.Rows.Add("ZZZZ", "Total Repair Time");Di2015NewLine    dtResults.Rows.Add("AAAA", "Critical Down Time");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    PrepareDataTable(dtResults);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15124287Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass DataCollectorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Action<List<byte>> _processMeasurement;Di2015NewLine    private readonly string _port;Di2015NewLine    private SerialPort _serialPort;Di2015NewLine    private const int SizeOfMeasurement = 4;Di2015NewLine    List<byte> Data = new List<byte>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DataCollector(string port, Action<List<byte>> processMeasurement)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _processMeasurement = processMeasurement;Di2015NewLine        _serialPort = new SerialPort(port);Di2015NewLine        _serialPort.DataReceived +=SerialPortDataReceived;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void SerialPortDataReceived(object sender, SerialDataReceivedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while(_serialPort.BytesToRead > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           var count = _serialPort.BytesToRead;Di2015NewLine           var bytes = new byte[count];Di2015NewLine           _serialPort.Read(bytes, 0, count);Di2015NewLine           AddBytes(bytes);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void AddBytes(byte[] bytes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Data.AddRange(bytes);Di2015NewLine        while(Data.Count > SizeOfMeasurement)            Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var measurementData = Data.GetRange(0, SizeOfMeasurement);Di2015NewLine            Data.RemoveRange(0, SizeOfMeasurement);Di2015NewLine            if (_processMeasurement != null) _processMeasurement(measurementData);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15125112Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate List<string> _headers = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected void gvOrdersProcessed_RowDataBound(object sender, GridViewRowEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Collect the texts from the column headersDi2015NewLine    if (e.Row.RowType == DataControlRowType.Header)Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i <= e.Row.Cells.Count - 1; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this._headers.Add(e.Row.Cells[i].Text);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (e.Row.RowType == DataControlRowType.DataRow)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i <= e.Row.Cells.Count - 1; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (TryToParse(e.Row.Cells[i].Text) > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string rowKey = e.Row.Cells[0].Text;Di2015NewLine                string column = this._headers[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                HyperLink link = new HyperLink();Di2015NewLine                link.Text = e.Row.Cells[i].Text;Di2015NewLine                link.NavigateUrl="page.aspx?key=" + rowKey  + "&column=" +column;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                e.Row.Cells[i].Controls.Clear();Di2015NewLine                e.Row.Cells[i].Controls.Add(link);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // For each of them, build em!Di2015NewLine    foreach (var projectPair in solutionProjects)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var project = 15125227Di2015UniqueSeparatorSystem.Threading.ThreadLocal<IView>
15125227Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SimpleInjectorPresenterFactory Di2015NewLine    : IPresenterFactoryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Container _container;Di2015NewLine    private ThreadLocal<IView> _currentView = Di2015NewLine        new ThreadLocal<IView>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public SimpleInjectorPresenterFactory(Di2015NewLine        Container container)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _container = container;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _container.ResolveUnregisteredType += (s, e) => Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (typeof(IView).IsAssignableFrom(Di2015NewLine                e.UnregisteredServiceType))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                e.Register(() => _currentView.Value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IPresenter Create(Type presenterType, Di2015NewLine        Type viewType, IView viewInstance)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _currentView.Value = viewInstance;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _container.GetInstance(presenterType) Di2015NewLine                as IPresenter;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Clear the thread-local value to ensureDi2015NewLine            // views can be disposed after the request ends.Di2015NewLine            _currentView.Value = null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15125227Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Type FindPresenterDescribedViewTypeCached(Di2015NewLine    Type presenter, IView view)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IntPtr handle = presenter.TypeHandle.Value;Di2015NewLine    if (!this.cache.ContainsKey(handle))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (this.syncLock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!this.cache.ContainsKey(handle))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Type viewType = CreateType(presenter, view);Di2015NewLine                this.cache[handle] = viewType;Di2015NewLine                return viewType;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return this.cache[handle];Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15126300Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (IsMobileBrowser())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine         Response.Redirect("/home");    Di2015NewLine         return;      Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // your other codeDi2015NewLine} Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static bool IsMobileBrowser()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //GETS THE CURRENT USER CONTEXTDi2015NewLine    HttpContext context = HttpContext.Current;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //FIRST TRY BUILT IN ASP.NT CHECKDi2015NewLine    if (context.Request.Browser.IsMobileDevice)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //THEN TRY CHECKING FOR THE HTTP_X_WAP_PROFILE HEADERDi2015NewLine    if (context.Request.ServerVariables["HTTP_X_WAP_PROFILE"] != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //THEN TRY CHECKING THAT HTTP_ACCEPT EXISTS AND CONTAINS WAPDi2015NewLine    if (context.Request.ServerVariables["HTTP_ACCEPT"] != null && Di2015NewLine        context.Request.ServerVariables["HTTP_ACCEPT"].ToLower().Contains("wap"))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //AND FINALLY CHECK THE HTTP_USER_AGENT Di2015NewLine    //HEADER VARIABLE FOR ANY ONE OF THE FOLLOWINGDi2015NewLine    if (context.Request.ServerVariables["HTTP_USER_AGENT"] != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Create a list of all mobile typesDi2015NewLine        string[] mobiles =new[]Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine              "midp", "j2me", "avant", "docomo", Di2015NewLine              "novarra", "palmos", "palmsource", Di2015NewLine              "240x320", "opwv", "chtml",Di2015NewLine              "pda", "windows ce", "mmp/", Di2015NewLine              "blackberry", "mib/", "symbian", Di2015NewLine              "wireless", "nokia", "hand", "mobi",Di2015NewLine              "phone", "cdm", "up.b", "audio", Di2015NewLine              "SIE-", "SEC-", "samsung", "HTC", Di2015NewLine              "mot-", "mitsu", "sagem", "sony"Di2015NewLine              , "alcatel", "lg", "eric", "vx", Di2015NewLine             "NEC", "philips", "mmm", "xx", Di2015NewLine             "panasonic", "sharp", "wap", "sch",Di2015NewLine             "rover", "pocket", "benq", "java", Di2015NewLine             "pt", "pg", "vox", "amoi", Di2015NewLine             "bird", "compal", "kg", "voda",Di2015NewLine             "sany", "kdd", "dbt", "sendo", Di2015NewLine             "sgh", "gradi", "jb", "dddi", Di2015NewLine             "moto", "iphone"Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Loop through each item in the list created above Di2015NewLine        //and check if the header contains that textDi2015NewLine        foreach (string s in mobiles)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(context.Request.ServerVariables["HTTP_USER_AGENT"].ToLower().Contains(s.ToLower()))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15136692Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ActionHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static Dictionary<Delegate, System.Threading.Timer> timers =Di2015NewLine        new Dictionary<Delegate, System.Threading.Timer>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static object lockObject = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void DelayAction(Action action, TimeSpan delay)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (lockObject)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            System.Threading.Timer timer;Di2015NewLine            if (!timers.TryGetValue(action, out timer))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                timer = new System.Threading.Timer(EventTimerCallback, action,Di2015NewLine                    System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite,Di2015NewLine                    System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite);Di2015NewLine                timers.Add(action, timer);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            timer.Change(delay, TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(-1));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void EventTimerCallback(object state)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var action = (Action)state;Di2015NewLine        lock (lockObject)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var timer = timers[action];Di2015NewLine            timers.Remove(action);Di2015NewLine            timer.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        action();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15140540Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Task SendAsync(this SmtpClient client, MailMessage message)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    TaskCompletionSource<object> tcs = new TaskCompletionSource<object>();Di2015NewLine    Guid sendGuid = Guid.NewGuid();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SendCompletedEventHandler handler = null;Di2015NewLine    handler = (o, ea) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ea.UserState is Guid && ((Guid)ea.UserState) == sendGuid)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            client.SendCompleted -= handler;Di2015NewLine            if (ea.Cancelled)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tcs.SetCanceled();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (ea.Error != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tcs.SetException(ea.Error);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tcs.SetResult(null);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    client.SendCompleted += handler;Di2015NewLine    client.SendAsync(message, sendGuid);Di2015NewLine    return tcs.Task;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15140540Di2015UniqueSeparatorContinueWith
15140540Di2015UniqueSeparatorTask sendTask = client.SendAsync(message);Di2015NewLinesendTask.ContinueWith(task => {Di2015NewLine    if(task.IsFaulted) {Di2015NewLine        Exception ex = task.InnerExceptions.First();Di2015NewLine        //handle errorDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if(task.IsCanceled) {Di2015NewLine        //handle cancellationDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else {Di2015NewLine        //task completed successfullyDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine});Di2015NewLine

15142008Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void StartListening()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Establish the locel endpoint for the socketDi2015NewLine    IPEndPoint localEndPoint = new IPEndPoint(IPAddress.Any, Port);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create a TCP/IP socketDi2015NewLine    listener = new Socket(AddressFamily.InterNetwork, SocketType.Stream, ProtocolType.Tcp);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Bind the socket to the local endpoint and listenDi2015NewLine        listener.Blocking = false;Di2015NewLine        listener.Bind(localEndPoint);Di2015NewLine        listener.Listen(100);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Start an asynchronous socket to listen for connectionsDi2015NewLine        performListen(listener); // changed by corsiKaDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        invokeStatusUpdate(0, e.Message);Di2015NewLine    }            Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15142817Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class OctreeNodeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public bool IsLeaf { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public OctreeNode[8] Children { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public OctreeNode()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.IsLeaf = true;Di2015NewLine        this.Children = null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Don't forget to implement methods to build up the tree and split the node when required.Di2015NewLine    // Splitting results in a tree structure. Inside the split-method Di2015NewLine    // you need to allocate the Children-Array and set the IsLeaf-Property to false.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Intersects(Line rayline, ref ICollection<OctreeNodes> Nodes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Interval interval;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If the current node does not intersect the ray, then we do not need toDi2015NewLine        // investigate further on from here.Di2015NewLine        if (!Rhino.Geometry.Intersect.Intersection.LineBox(rayline, this.GetBoundingBox(), 0, out interval))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If this is a leaf (in which we are interested in) we add it to Di2015NewLine        // the nodes-collection.Di2015NewLine        if (this.IsLeaf)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Nodes.Add(this);Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Not a leaf, but our box intersects with the ray, so we need to investigate further.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 8; ++i)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Recursive call here, but the result doesn't actually matter.Di2015NewLine            this.Children[i].Intersects(rayline, Nodes)Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // The ray intersects with our current node.Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15142817Di2015UniqueSeparatorParallel.For<int> (0; 8; i =>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    this.Children[i].Intersects(rayline, Nodes)Di2015NewLine});Di2015NewLine

15145499Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CustomSimpleMembershipProviderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly UsersContext _db = new UsersContext();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool CreateUser(string username, string password, string firstName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var userCreated = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        WebSecurity.CreateUserAndAccount(username, password);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var userProfile = _db.UserProfiles.FirstOrDefault(u => u.UserName == username);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Check if user already existsDi2015NewLine        if (userProfile != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var member = new Model.User { FirstName = firstName, UserProfile = userProfile };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _db.Users.Add(member);Di2015NewLine                _db.SaveChanges();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                userCreated = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Add logging or throw whatever exceptions neededDi2015NewLine                throw;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return userCreated;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15150493Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> Permute<T>(this IEnumerable<T> sequence)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (sequence == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var list = sequence.ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!list.Any())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return Enumerable.Empty<T>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var startingElementIndex = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var startingElement in list)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var remainingItems = list.AllExcept(startingElementIndex);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var permutationOfRemainder in remainingItems.Permute())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return startingElement.Concat(permutationOfRemainder);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            startingElementIndex++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static IEnumerable<T> Concat<T>(this T firstElement, IEnumerable<T> secondSequence)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    yield return firstElement;Di2015NewLine    if (secondSequence == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var item in secondSequence)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return item;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static IEnumerable<T> AllExcept<T>(this IEnumerable<T> sequence, int indexToSkip)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (sequence == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var index = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var item in sequence.Where(item => index++ != indexToSkip))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return item;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15151398Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int GetWeekOfMonth(DateTime dateTime)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    DayOfWeek dayOfWeek = dateTime.DayOfWeek;Di2015NewLine    DateTime dayStep = new DateTime(dateTime.Year, dateTime.Month, 1);Di2015NewLine    int returnValue = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (dayStep <= dateTime)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (dayStep.DayOfWeek == dayOfWeek)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            returnValue++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        dayStep = dayStep.AddDays(1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return returnValue;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15151398Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string GetWeekOfMonth(DateTime dateTime)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    DayOfWeek dayOfWeek = dateTime.DayOfWeek;Di2015NewLine    DateTime dayStep = new DateTime(dateTime.Year, dateTime.Month, 1);Di2015NewLine    int returnValue = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (dayStep <= dateTime)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (dayStep.DayOfWeek == dayOfWeek)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            returnValue++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        dayStep = dayStep.AddDays(1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    switch (returnValue % 100)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case 11:Di2015NewLine        case 12:Di2015NewLine        case 13:Di2015NewLine            return returnValue.ToString() + "th";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    switch (returnValue % 10)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case 1:Di2015NewLine            return returnValue.ToString() + "st";Di2015NewLine        case 2:Di2015NewLine            return returnValue.ToString() + "nd";Di2015NewLine        case 3:Di2015NewLine            return returnValue.ToString() + "rd";Di2015NewLine        default:Di2015NewLine            return returnValue.ToString() + "th";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15154172Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Security.Cryptography;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace EncryptoDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static void Main()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            const string password = "test";Di2015NewLine            const string text = "test";Di2015NewLine            var cipherText = Aes.Encrypt(password, text);Di2015NewLine            var decrypted = Aes.Decrypt(password, cipherText);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(decrypted);Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal static class AesDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static EncryptedData Encrypt(string password, string data)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Transform(true, password, data, null) as EncryptedData;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static string Decrypt(string password, EncryptedData data)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Transform(false, password, data.DataString, data.SaltString) as string;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static object Transform(bool encrypt, string password, string data, string saltString)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (var aes = new AesManaged())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                aes.Mode = CipherMode.CBC;Di2015NewLine                aes.Padding = PaddingMode.PKCS7;Di2015NewLine                var keyLen = aes.KeySize/8;Di2015NewLine                var ivLen = aes.BlockSize/8;Di2015NewLine                const int saltSize = 8;Di2015NewLine                const int iterations = 8192;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var salt = encrypt ? new byte[saltSize] : Convert.FromBase64String(saltString);Di2015NewLine                if (encrypt)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    new RNGCryptoServiceProvider().GetBytes(salt);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var bcKey = new Rfc2898DeriveBytes("BLK" + password, salt, iterations).GetBytes(keyLen);Di2015NewLine                var iv = new Rfc2898DeriveBytes("IV" + password, salt, iterations).GetBytes(ivLen);Di2015NewLine                var macKey = new Rfc2898DeriveBytes("MAC" + password, salt, iterations).GetBytes(16);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                aes.Key = bcKey;Di2015NewLine                aes.IV = iv;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var rawData = encrypt ? Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(data) : Convert.FromBase64String(data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                using (var transform = encrypt ? aes.CreateEncryptor() : aes.CreateDecryptor())Di2015NewLine                using (var memoryStream = encrypt ? new MemoryStream() : new MemoryStream(rawData))Di2015NewLine                using (var cryptoStream = new CryptoStream(memoryStream, transform, encrypt ? CryptoStreamMode.Write : CryptoStreamMode.Read))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (encrypt)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        cryptoStream.Write(rawData, 0, rawData.Length);Di2015NewLine                        cryptoStream.FlushFinalBlock();Di2015NewLine                        return new EncryptedData(salt, macKey, memoryStream.ToArray());Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    var originalData = new byte[rawData.Length];Di2015NewLine                    var count = cryptoStream.Read(originalData, 0, originalData.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    return Encoding.UTF8.GetString(originalData, 0, count);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public class EncryptedDataDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            public EncryptedData(byte[] salt, byte[] mac, byte[] data)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Salt = salt;Di2015NewLine                MAC = mac;Di2015NewLine                Data = data;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            private byte[] Salt { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public string SaltStringDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                get { return Convert.ToBase64String(Salt); }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            private byte[] MAC { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            private byte[] Data { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public string DataStringDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                get { return Convert.ToBase64String(Data); }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15159459Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class SqlConnectionExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<T> Get<T>(this IDbConnection connection, Expression<Func<T, object>> expression) where T : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (connection)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            connection.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var binaryExpression = (BinaryExpression)((UnaryExpression) expression.Body).Operand;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var left = Expression.Lambda<Func<T, object>>(Expression.Convert(binaryExpression.Left, typeof(object)), expression.Parameters[0]);Di2015NewLine            var right = binaryExpression.Right.GetType().GetProperty("Value").GetValue(binaryExpression.Right);Di2015NewLine            var theOperator = DetermineOperator(binaryExpression);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var predicate = Predicates.Field(left, theOperator, right);Di2015NewLine            var entities = connection.GetList<T>(predicate, commandTimeout: 30);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            connection.Close();Di2015NewLine            return entities;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Operator DetermineOperator(Expression binaryExpression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (binaryExpression.NodeType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.Equal:Di2015NewLine                return Operator.Eq;Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.GreaterThan:Di2015NewLine                return Operator.Gt;Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.GreaterThanOrEqual:Di2015NewLine                return Operator.Ge;Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.LessThan:Di2015NewLine                return Operator.Lt;Di2015NewLine            case ExpressionType.LessThanOrEqual:Di2015NewLine                return Operator.Le;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                return Operator.Eq;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15163686Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IObservable<string> Split(Di2015NewLine          this IObservable<char> incomingCharacters, Di2015NewLine          char sep)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Share a single subscriptionDi2015NewLine    var oneSource = incomingCharacters.Publish().RefCount();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Our "stop buffering" trigger will be the separatorsDi2015NewLine    var onlySeparators = oneSourceDi2015NewLine        .Where(c => c == sep);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return oneSourceDi2015NewLine        // buffer until we get a separatorDi2015NewLine        .Buffer(onlySeparators)Di2015NewLine        // then return a new string from the buffered charsDi2015NewLine        .Select(carr => new string(carr.ToArray()));        Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15163686Di2015UniqueSeparatorBufferUntil

15164962Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void CheckWinner(Buttons[] buttonArray)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int arrLength = buttonArray.Length; Di2015NewLine    int hCount = 0;Di2015NewLine    //int vCount = 0;Di2015NewLine    int root = (int)Math.Sqrt(Convert.ToDouble(arrLength));  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < arrLength ; i++)Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        string bText = buttonArray[i].Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        hCount = i % root == 0? 0 : hCount;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(bText == "X") Di2015NewLine            hCount++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(hCount == root) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Horizontal row winner found !");Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15164962Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void CheckWinner(Buttons[] buttonArray)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int arrLength = buttonArray.Length; Di2015NewLine    int hCount = 0;Di2015NewLine    Int vCount = 0;Di2015NewLine    int root = (int)Math.Sqrt(Convert.ToDouble(arrLength));  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0;  i < root;  i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        hCount = 0;Di2015NewLine        vCount = 0;Di2015NewLine        for(int j = 0;  j < root; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           if(buttonArray[ (i * root) + j ].Text == "X")Di2015NewLine              hCount++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           if(buttonArray[ i + (root * j) ].Text == "X")Di2015NewLine              vCount++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if( hCount + vCount == 2 * root)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           Console.WriteLine("Horizontal and Virtical winner found !");Di2015NewLine           break;Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine        else if ( hCount == root )Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine           Console.WriteLine("Horizontal winner found !");Di2015NewLine           break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if ( vCount == root )Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine           Console.WriteLine("Virtical winner found !");Di2015NewLine           break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
