15167446Di2015UniqueSeparatorBitmap bmpOrg = new Bitmap("bKawM.png");Di2015NewLineBitmap bmp = new Bitmap(106, 119);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < 106;i++ )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int j = 0; j < 119;j++ )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Color rgb = bmpOrg.GetPixel(i, j);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int bit24 = (rgb.B << 16 + rgb.G << 8 + rgb.R);Di2015NewLine        int user = bit24 & 0x07;Di2015NewLine        int realDepth = bit24 >> 3;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bmp.SetPixel(i, j, Color.FromArgb(realDepth));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepictureBox1.Image = bmp;Di2015NewLine
15167446Di2015UniqueSeparatorStream imageStreamSource = new FileStream("bKawM.png", FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read, FileShare.Read);Di2015NewLinePngBitmapDecoder decoder = new PngBitmapDecoder(imageStreamSource, BitmapCreateOptions.PreservePixelFormat, BitmapCacheOption.Default);Di2015NewLineBitmapSource bitmapSource = decoder.Frames[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint height = bitmapSource.PixelHeight;Di2015NewLineint width = bitmapSource.PixelWidth;Di2015NewLineint stride = width * ((bitmapSource.Format.BitsPerPixel + 7) / 8);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinebyte[] bytes = new byte[height * stride];Di2015NewLinebitmapSource.CopyPixels(bytes, stride, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor (int x = 0; x < width; x++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (int y = 0; y < height; y++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte low = bytes[y * stride + x + 0];Di2015NewLine        byte high = bytes[y * stride + x + 1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ushort bit16 = (ushort)((high << 8) | low);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int user = bit16 & 0x07;Di2015NewLine        int realDepth = bit16 >> 3;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15167581Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class EntryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // give meaningful names to the column valuesDi2015NewLine    public int Column1 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Column2 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Column3 { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Column4 { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // overriden to make re-constructing the line for the file easierDi2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // assuming tab as the delimiter, replace with whatever you're usingDi2015NewLine        return string.Format("{0}\\t{1}\\t{2}\\t{3}", this.Column1, this.Column2,Di2015NewLine            this.Column3, this.Column4);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15167581Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar entries = new List<Entry>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing (var fStream = File.OpenRead(fileLocation))Di2015NewLineusing (var reader = new StreamReader(fStream))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    while (!reader.EOF)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var line = reader.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // assuming tab as the delimiter, replace with whatever you're usingDi2015NewLine        var parts = line.Split('\\t');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (parts.Length != 4)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // whatever you need to do for error handlingDi2015NewLine            // you could throw an error or just skip to the next lineDi2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        entries.Add(Di2015NewLine            new EntryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // ideally you'd use int.TryParse to provide further error handlingDi2015NewLine                Column1 = int.Parse(parts[0]),Di2015NewLine                Column2 = int.Parse(parts[1]),Di2015NewLine                Column3 = int.Parse(parts[2]),Di2015NewLine                Column4 = int.Parse(parts[4])Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15167594Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic int CompareParallel(ushort[]x, ushort[] y, int len, int segLen)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int compareArrLen = ( len / segLen ) + 1;Di2015NewLine    int [ ] compareArr = new int [ compareArrLen ];Di2015NewLine    Parallel.For ( 0 , compareArrLen , Di2015NewLine                   new Action<int , ParallelLoopState> ( ( i , state ) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if ( state.LowestBreakIteration.HasValue Di2015NewLine                 && state.LowestBreakIteration.Value < i )Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        int segEnd = ( i + 1 ) * segLen;Di2015NewLine        int k = len < segEnd ? len : segEnd;Di2015NewLine        for ( int j = i * segLen ; j < k ; j++ )Di2015NewLine            if ( x [ j ] != y [ j ] )Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                compareArr [ i ] = ( x [ j ].CompareTo ( y [ j ] ) );Di2015NewLine                state.Break ( );Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine    } ) );Di2015NewLine    int r = compareArrLen - 1;Di2015NewLine    while ( r >= 0 )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if ( compareArr [ r ] != 0 )Di2015NewLine            return compareArr [ r ];Di2015NewLine        r--;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return x.Length.CompareTo ( y.Length );Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic int CompareSequential ( ushort [ ] x , ushort [ ] y, int len )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int pos = 0;Di2015NewLine    while ( pos < len && x [ pos ] == y [ pos ] )Di2015NewLine        pos++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return pos < len ?Di2015NewLine        x [ pos ].CompareTo ( y [ pos ] ) :Di2015NewLine        x.Length.CompareTo ( y.Length );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic int Compare( ushort [ ] x , ushort [ ] y ) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //determined through testing to be the best on my machineDi2015NewLine    const int cutOff = 4096;Di2015NewLine    int len = x.Length < y.Length ? x.Length : y.Length;Di2015NewLine    //check if len is above a specific threshold Di2015NewLine    //and if first and a number in the middle are equalDi2015NewLine    //chose equal because we know that there is a chance that moreDi2015NewLine    //then 50% of the list is equal, which would make the overheadDi2015NewLine    //worth the effortDi2015NewLine    if ( len > cutOff && x [ len - 1 ] == y [ len - 1 ] Di2015NewLine           && x [ len/2 ] == y [ len/2 ] )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //segment length was determined to be best through testingDi2015NewLine        //at around 8% of the size of the array seemed to have theDi2015NewLine        //on my machineDi2015NewLine        return CompareParallel ( x , y , len , (len / 100)*8 );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return CompareSequential ( x , y, len );Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

private const string _testBody = Di2015NewLine                  "\\r\\n\\tOriginal:: Result:{0}, Elapsed:{1}"Di2015NewLine                 +"\\r\\n\\tParallel:: Result:{2}, Elapsed:{3}"Di2015NewLine                 +"\\r\\n\\tComposite:: Result:{4}, Elapsed:{5}";Di2015NewLine    private const string _testHeader = Di2015NewLine                  "\\r\\nTesting {0}, Array Lengths: {1}, {2}";Di2015NewLine    public static double[] RandomRunTest(string testName, int shortArr1Len, Di2015NewLine                                         int shortArr2Len, int parallelSegLen)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var shortArr1 = new ushort [ shortArr1Len ];Di2015NewLine        var shortArr2 = new ushort [ shortArr2Len ];Di2015NewLine        double [ ] avgTimes = new double [ 3 ];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        LogDetail ( _testHeader , testName , shortArr1Len , shortArr2Len ) ;Di2015NewLine        for ( int i = 0 ; i < 10 ; i++ )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int arrlen1 = shortArr1.Length , arrlen2 = shortArr2.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            double[] currResults = new double [ 3 ];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            FillCompareArray ( shortArr1 , shortArr1.Length );Di2015NewLine            FillCompareArray ( shortArr2 , shortArr2.Length );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var sw = new Stopwatch ( );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Force Garbage Collection Di2015NewLine            //to avoid having it effect Di2015NewLine            //the test results this way Di2015NewLine            //test 2 may have to garbage Di2015NewLine            //collect due to running secondDi2015NewLine            GC.Collect ( );Di2015NewLine            sw.Start ( );Di2015NewLine            int origResult = Compare ( shortArr1 , shortArr2 );Di2015NewLine            sw.Stop ( );Di2015NewLine            currResults[0] = sw.Elapsed.TotalMilliseconds;Di2015NewLine            sw.Reset ( );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            parallelSegLen );Di2015NewLine            sw.Stop ( );Di2015NewLine            currResults [ 1 ] = sw.Elapsed.TotalMilliseconds;Di2015NewLine            sw.Reset ( );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            GC.Collect ( );Di2015NewLine            sw.Start ( );Di2015NewLine            int compositeResults = CompareComposite ( shortArr1 , shortArr2 );Di2015NewLine            sw.Stop ( );                Di2015NewLine            currResults [ 2 ] = sw.Elapsed.TotalMilliseconds;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            LogDetail ( _testBody, origResult , currResults[0] , Di2015NewLine                        parallelResult , currResults[1], Di2015NewLine                        compositeResults, currResults[2]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for ( int l = 0 ; l < currResults.Length ; l++ )Di2015NewLine                avgTimes [ l ] = ( ( avgTimes[l]*i)+currResults[l]) Di2015NewLine                                    / ( i + 1 );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        LogDetail ( "\\r\\nAverage Run Time Original: {0}" , avgTimes[0]);Di2015NewLine        LogDetail ( "Average Run Time Parallel: {0}" , avgTimes[1]);Di2015NewLine        LogDetail ( "Average Run Time Composite: {0}" , avgTimes [ 2 ] );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return avgTimes;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static double [ ] EqualTill ( string );Di2015NewLine        return avgTimes;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static Random rand = new Random ( );Di2015NewLine    public static void FillCompareArray ( ushort[] compareArray, int length ) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var retVals = new byte[length];Di2015NewLine        ( rand ).NextBytes ( retVals );Di2015NewLine        Array.Copy ( retVals , compareArray , length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static int CompareParallelOnly ( ushort [ ] x , ushort[] y, Di2015NewLine                                            int segLen ) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       int len = x.Length<y.Length ? x.Length:y.Length;Di2015NewLine       int compareArrLen = (len/segLen)+1;Di2015NewLine       int[] compareArr = new int [ compareArrLen ];Di2015NewLine       Parallel.For ( 0 , compareArrLen , Di2015NewLine           new Action<int , ParallelLoopState> ( ( i , state ) =>Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine           if ( state.LowestBreakIteration.HasValue Di2015NewLine                    && state.LowestBreakIteration.Value < i )Di2015NewLine               return;Di2015NewLine           int segEnd = ( i + 1 ) * segLen;Di2015NewLine           int k = len<segEnd?len:segEnd;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           for ( int j = i * segLen ; j < k ; j++ )Di2015NewLine               if ( x [ j ] != y [ j ] compareArr [ r ] != 0 )Di2015NewLine               return compareArr [ r ];Di2015NewLine           r--;Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine       return x.Length.CompareTo ( y.Length );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static int Compare ( ushort [ ] x , ushort [ ] y )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int pos = 0;Di2015NewLine        int len = Math.Min ( x.Length , y.Length );Di2015NewLine        while ( pos < len && x [ pos ] == y [ pos ] )Di2015NewLine            pos++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return pos < len ?Di2015NewLine            x [ pos ].CompareTo ( y [ pos ] ) :Di2015NewLine            x.Length.CompareTo ( y.Length );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static int CompareParallel ( ushort[] x, ushort[] y, int len, Di2015NewLine                                        int segLen )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int compareArrLen = ( len / segLen ) + 1;Di2015NewLine        int [ ] compareArr = new int [ compareArrLen ];Di2015NewLine        Parallel.For ( 0 , compareArrLen , Di2015NewLine            new Action<int , ParallelLoopState> ( ( i , state ) =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if ( state.LowestBreakIteration.HasValue Di2015NewLine                 && state.LowestBreakIteration.Value < i )Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            int segEnd = ( i + 1 ) * segLen;Di2015NewLine            int k = len < segEnd ? len : segEnd;Di2015NewLine            for ( int j = i * segLen ; j < k ; j++ )Di2015NewLine                if ( x [ j ] != y [ j ] )Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    compareArr [ i ] = ( x [ j ].CompareTo ( y [ j ] ) );Di2015NewLine                    state.Break ( );Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine        } ) );Di2015NewLine        int r = compareArrLen - 1;Di2015NewLine        while ( r >= 0 )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if ( compareArr [ r ] != 0 )Di2015NewLine                return compareArr [ r ];Di2015NewLine            r--;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return x.Length.CompareTo ( y.Length );Di2015NewLine x [ pos ] == y [ pos ] )Di2015NewLine            pos++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return pos < len ?Di2015NewLine            x [ pos ].CompareTo ( y [ pos ] ) :Di2015NewLine 15168083Di2015UniqueSeparatorint lastLevel = -1;Di2015NewLinestring line;Di2015NewLinewhile ((line = file.ReadLine()) != null)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int level = GetLevel(line); // from code aboveDi2015NewLine    int diff = level - lastLevel;Di2015NewLine    if (diff > 1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // skipping multiple levels forward is probably an error.Di2015NewLine        throw new ApplicationException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (diff == 1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // next level. Add a <ul>Di2015NewLine        WriteUl();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (diff == 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // same level. 15168120Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected void Application_Error()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Exception unhandledException = Server.GetLastError();Di2015NewLine    HttpException httpException = unhandledException as HttpException;Di2015NewLine    if (httpException == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Exception innerException = unhandledException.InnerException;Di2015NewLine        httpException = innerException as HttpException;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (httpException != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int httpCode = httpException.GetHttpCode();Di2015NewLine        switch (httpCode)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case (int)HttpStatusCode.Unauthorized:Di2015NewLine                Response.Redirect("/Http/Error401");Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // TODO: don't forget that here you have many other status codes to test Di2015NewLine            // and handle in addition to 401.Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // It was not an HttpException. This will be executed for your test action.Di2015NewLine            // Here you should log and handle this case. Use the unhandledException instance hereDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15170597Di2015UniqueSeparator// There's a lot of replication and style choices here thatDi2015NewLine// will make it harder to debug/troubleshoot Di2015NewLineif (_objDirection == Direction.Right)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (_x < _boardWidth - 1 && _x >= 0 && _x + 1 < _boardWidth - 1 && _x + 1 >= 0)Di2015NewLine        _x += 1;Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        _x = _boardWidth - 1;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineelse if (_objDirection == Direction.Left)Di2015NewLine
15170597Di2015UniqueSeparator// let's figure these out ahead of timeDi2015NewLinevar spaceOnLeft = _x > 0;Di2015NewLinevar spaceOnRight = _x < _boardWidth - 1;Di2015NewLinevar spaceOnTop = _y > 0;Di2015NewLinevar spaceOnBottom = _y < _boardHeight - 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// switch is a bit like the if/else construct you hadDi2015NewLineswitch (_objDirection)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    case Direction.Up:Di2015NewLine        // this means: if(spaceOnTop) y = y-1 else y = height-1Di2015NewLine        _y = spaceOnTop ? _y - 1 : _boardHeight - 1;Di2015NewLine        break;Di2015NewLine    case Direction.Down:Di2015NewLine        _y = spaceOnBottom ? _y + 1 : 0;Di2015NewLine        break;Di2015NewLine    case Direction.Left:Di2015NewLine        _x = spaceOnLeft ? _x - 1 : _boardWidth - 1;Di2015NewLine        break;Di2015NewLine    case Direction.Right:Di2015NewLine        _x = spaceOnRight ? _x + 1 : 0;Di2015NewLine        break;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15170597Di2015UniqueSeparator// now we'll use the old position to clear...Di2015NewLinelevel[oldX, oldY] = 0;Di2015NewLine// then set the new positionDi2015NewLinelevel[_x, _y] = _k;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Since we're only writing on the panel,Di2015NewLine// we only need to rerender the panelDi2015NewLinepanel1.Refresh();Di2015NewLine

PaintEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /*Di2015NewLine               int[,] level = {Di2015NewLine                               { 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 ,0 },Di2015NewLine     { 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 ,0 },Di2015NewLine                               { 0, 0, 0, 0, 0 ,0 },Di2015NewLine                           };Di2015NewLine        */Di2015NewLine        #region Looping through tilesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Initializing first randomly filled tileDi2015NewLine        level[_x, _y] = _k;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int y = 0; y < _boardHeight; y++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int x = 0; x < _boardWidth; x++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Empty TileDi2015NewLine                if (level[x, y] == 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Create pen.Di2015NewLine                    Pen redPen = new Pen(Color.Red, 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Create rectangle.Di2015NewLine                    Rectangle redRect = new Rectangle(x * 50, y * 50, 50, 50);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Draw rectangle to screen.Di2015NewLine                    e.Graphics.DrawRectangle(redPen, redRect);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Occupied TileDi2015NewLine                if (level[x, y] == 1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Create solid brush.Di2015NewLine                    SolidBrush blueBrush = new SolidBrush(Color.Blue);Di2015NewLine                    // Create rectangle.Di2015NewLine                    Rectangle rect = new Rectangle(x * 50, y * 50, 50, 50);Di2015NewLine                    // Fill rectangle to screen.Di2015NewLine                    e.Graphics.FillRectangle(blueBrush, rect);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Responsible for movementsDi2015NewLine    private void tmrMov_Tick(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        #region Timer functionDi2015NewLine        // instead, keep track temporarilyDi2015NewLine        // what they wereDi2015NewLine        var oldX = _x;Di2015NewLine        var oldY = _y;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // let's figure these out ahead of timeDi2015NewLine        var spaceOnLeft = _x > 0;Di2015NewLine        var spaceOnRight = _x < _boardWidth - 1;Di2015NewLine        var spaceOnTop = _y > 0;Di2015NewLine        var spaceOnBottom = _y < _boardHeight - 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // switch is a bit like the if/else construct you hadDi2015NewLine        switch (_objDirection)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case Direction.Up:Di2015NewLine                // this means: if(spaceOnTop) y = y-1 else y = height-1Di2015NewLine                _y = spaceOnTop ? _y - 1 : _boardHeight - 1;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case Direction.Down:Di2015NewLine                _y = spaceOnBottom ? _y + 1 : 0;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case Direction.Left:Di2015NewLine                _x = spaceOnLeft ? _x - 1 : _boardWidth - 1;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case Direction.Right:Di2015NewLine                _x = spaceOnRight ? _x + 1 : 0;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // now we'll use the old values to clear...Di2015NewLine        level[oldX, oldY] = 0;Di2015NewLine        // then set the new valueDi2015NewLine        level[_x, _y] = _k;Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLine        panel1.Refresh();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Event Handler (W,A,S,D) is used for movementsDi2015NewLine    private void Form1_PreviewKeyDown(object sender, PreviewKeyDownEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        #region ControlsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // same deal here, but with keysDi2015NewLine        switch (e.KeyCode)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case Keys.Up:Di2015NewLine                e.IsInputKey = true;Di2015NewLine                _objDirection = Direction.Up;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case Keys.Down:Di2015NewLine                e.IsInputKey = true;Di2015NewLine                _objDirection = Direction.Down;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case Keys.Right:Di2015NewLine                e.IsInputKey = true;Di2015NewLine                _objDirection = Direction.Right;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15173853Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void PrintColumnHeaders(NWRevalDatabaseEntities entities, string tableName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var sc = ((System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection)entities.Connection).StoreConnection;Di2015NewLine    System.Data.SQLite.SQLiteConnection sqliteConnection = (System.Data.SQLite.SQLiteConnection)sc;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    sqliteConnection.Open();Di2015NewLine    System.Data.Common.DbCommand cmd = sc.CreateCommand();Di2015NewLine    cmd.CommandType = System.Data.CommandType.Text;Di2015NewLine    cmd.CommandText = string.Format("PRAGMA table_info('{0}');", tableName);Di2015NewLine    System.Data.Common.DbDataReader reader = cmd.ExecuteReader();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (reader.HasRows)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        object[] values = new object[reader.FieldCount];Di2015NewLine        while (reader.Read())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int result = reader.GetValues(values);Di2015NewLine            string columnHeader = (string)values[1]; // table_info returns a row for each column, with the column header in the second column.Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Column Header: {0}", columnHeader);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    sqliteConnection.Close();Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

15176341Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void RebuildIndices()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Logger.Info(i => i("Rebuilding the Full-Text indices..."));Di2015NewLine    var entityTypes = GetIndexableTypes();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (entityTypes.Count() == 0) return;Di2015NewLine    FullText.ClearIndices();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var entityType in entityTypes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var entityList = _Session.CreateCriteria(entityType).List();Di2015NewLine        var populateIndexMethod = typeof(FullText).GetMethod("PopulateIndex", BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Static);Di2015NewLine        var typedPopulateIndexMethod = populateIndexMethod.MakeGenericMethod(entityType);Di2015NewLine        typedPopulateIndexMethod.Invoke(null, new object[] { entityList });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15176541Di2015UniqueSeparator        public override int GetHashCode() { Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#if FEATURE_RANDOMIZED_STRING_HASHINGDi2015NewLine            if(HashHelpers.s_UseRandomizedStringHashing)Di2015NewLine            { Di2015NewLine                return InternalMarvin32HashString(this, this.Length, 0);Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLine#endif // FEATURE_RANDOMIZED_STRING_HASHING Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            unsafe { Di2015NewLine                fixed (char *src = this) {Di2015NewLine                    Contract.Assert(src[this.Length] == '\\0', "src[this.Length] == '\\\\0'");Di2015NewLine                    Contract.Assert( ((int)src)%4 == 0, "Managed string should start at 4 bytes boundary");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#if WIN32Di2015NewLine                    int hash1 = (5381<<16) + 5381; Di2015NewLine#else Di2015NewLine                    int hash1 = 5381;Di2015NewLine#endif Di2015NewLine                    int hash2 = hash1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine#if WIN32Di2015NewLine                    // 32 bit machines. Di2015NewLine                    int* pint = (int *)src;Di2015NewLine                    int len = this.Length; Di2015NewLine                    while (len > 2) Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        hash1 = ((hash1 << 5) + hash1 + (hash1 >> 27)) ^ pint[0]; Di2015NewLine                        hash2 = ((hash2 << 5) + hash2 + (hash2 >> 27)) ^ pint[1];Di2015NewLine                        pint += 2;Di2015NewLine                        len  -= 4;Di2015NewLine                    } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (len > 0) Di2015NewLine                    { Di2015NewLine                        hash1 = ((hash1 << 5) + hash1 + (hash1 >> 27)) ^ pint[0];Di2015NewLine                    } Di2015NewLine#elseDi2015NewLine                    int     c;Di2015NewLine                    char *s = src;Di2015NewLine                    while ((c = s[0]) != 0) { Di2015NewLine                        hash1 = ((hash1 << 5) + hash1) ^ c;Di2015NewLine                        c = s[1]; Di2015NewLine                        if (c == 0) Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                        hash2 = ((hash2 << 5) + hash2) ^ c; Di2015NewLine                        s += 2;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine#endifDi2015NewLine#if DEBUG Di2015NewLine                    // We want to ensure we can change our hash function daily.Di2015NewLine                    // This is perfectly fine as long as you don't persist the Di2015NewLine                    // value from GetHashCode to disk or count on String A Di2015NewLine                    // hashing before string B.  Those are bugs in your code.Di2015NewLine                    hash1 ^= ThisAssembly.DailyBuildNumber; Di2015NewLine#endifDi2015NewLine                    return hash1 + (hash2 * 1566083941);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

15179353Di2015UniqueSeparatorExpression.NodeType
15179353Di2015UniqueSeparatorMethodInfos
15179353Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string GetSqlExpression(Expression expression)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (expression is BinaryExpression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return string.Format("({0} {1} {2})",Di2015NewLine            GetSqlExpression(((BinaryExpression)expression).Left),Di2015NewLine            GetBinaryOperator((BinaryExpression)expression),Di2015NewLine            GetSqlExpression(((BinaryExpression)expression).Right));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (expression is MemberExpression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MemberExpression member = (MemberExpression)expression;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // it is somewhat naive to make a bool member into "Member = TRUE"Di2015NewLine        // since the expression "Member == true" will turn into "(Member = TRUE) = TRUE"Di2015NewLine        if (member.Type == typeof(bool))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return string.Format("([{0}] = TRUE)", member.Member.Name);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return string.Format("[{0}]", member.Member.Name);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (expression is ConstantExpression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ConstantExpression constant = (ConstantExpression)expression;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // create a proper SQL representation for each typeDi2015NewLine        if (constant.Type == typeof(int) ||Di2015NewLine            constant.Type == typeof(string))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return constant.Value.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (constant.Type == typeof(bool))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (bool)constant.Value ? "TRUE" : "FALSE";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    throw new ArgumentException();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string GetBinaryOperator(BinaryExpression expression)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    switch (expression.NodeType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.Equal:Di2015NewLine            return "=";Di2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.NotEqual:Di2015NewLine            return "<>";Di2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.OrElse:Di2015NewLine            return "OR";Di2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.AndAlso:Di2015NewLine            return "AND";Di2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.LessThan:Di2015NewLine            return "<";Di2015NewLine        case ExpressionType.GreaterThan:Di2015NewLine            return ">";Di2015NewLine        default:Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15179707Di2015UniqueSeparatorDispose
15179707Di2015UniqueSeparator// I split this into a separate interface simply to make the boundary betweenDi2015NewLine// canceller and cancellee explicit, similar to CancellationTokenSource itself.Di2015NewLinepublic interface ITokenSourceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    CancellationToken Token { get; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class InterAppDomainCancellable: MarshalByRefObject,Di2015NewLine                                        ITokenSource,Di2015NewLine                                        IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public InterAppDomainCancellable()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        cts = new CancellationTokenSource();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Cancel() { cts.Cancel(); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Explicitly implemented to make it less tempting to call TokenDi2015NewLine    // from the wrong side of the boundary.Di2015NewLine    CancellationToken ITokenSource.Token { get { return cts.Token; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Dispose() { cts.Dispose(); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly CancellationTokenSource cts;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Crucial difference here is that the remotable cancellation sourceDi2015NewLine// also lives in the other domain.Di2015NewLineinterAppDomainCancellable = childDomain.CreateInstanceAndUnwrap(...);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar primaryCts = new CancellationTokenSource();Di2015NewLine// Cancel the secondary when the primary is cancelled.Di2015NewLineprimaryCts.Token.Register(() => interAppDomainCancellable.Cancel());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineobjectInRemoteAppDomain = childDomain.CreateInstanceAndUnwrap(...);Di2015NewLine// DoWork expects an instance of ITokenSource.Di2015NewLine// It can access Token because they're all in the same domain together.Di2015NewLineobjectInRemoteAppDomain.DoWork(interAppDomainCancellable);Di2015NewLine

15179896Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class DarkenColorConverter : IValueConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public object Convert(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double percentage = 0.8;Di2015NewLine        if (parameter != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double.TryParse(parameter.ToString(), out percentage);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (value is SolidColorBrush)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Color color = (value as SolidColorBrush).Color;Di2015NewLine            return new SolidColorBrush(Color.FromRgb((byte)(color.R * percentage), (byte)(color.G * percentage), (byte)(color.B * percentage)));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (value is Color)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Color color = (Color)value;Di2015NewLine            return Color.FromRgb((byte)(color.R * percentage), (byte)(color.G * percentage), (byte)(color.B * percentage));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object ConvertBack(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15180996Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass Program {Di2015NewLine    private class CustomerDto {Di2015NewLine        public int CustomerId { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public string CustomerName { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private class ItemDto {Di2015NewLine        public int ItemId { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public string ItemName { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private class OrderDto {Di2015NewLine        public int Id { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public int ItemId { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public int CustomerId { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public int Quantity { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private class CustomerOrderDto {Di2015NewLine        public int CustomerId { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public int ItemId { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public int TotalQuantity { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine        List<CustomerDto> Customers = new List<CustomerDto>() { Di2015NewLine            new CustomerDto() { CustomerId = 1, CustomerName = "one"},Di2015NewLine            new CustomerDto() { CustomerId = 2, CustomerName = "two"},Di2015NewLine            new CustomerDto() { CustomerId = 3, CustomerName = "three"}Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        List<ItemDto> Items = new List<ItemDto>() { Di2015NewLine            new ItemDto() { ItemId = 1, ItemName = "item one"},Di2015NewLine            new ItemDto() { ItemId = 2, ItemName = "item two"},Di2015NewLine            new ItemDto() { ItemId = 3, ItemName = "item three"}Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        // customer1 has 2 orders for item 1, 0 for item 2 or 3Di2015NewLine        // customer2 has 1 order for item 2, 0 for item 1 or 3Di2015NewLine        // customer3 has 1 order for item 2, 1 order for item 3 and 0 for item 1Di2015NewLine        List<OrderDto> Orders = new List<OrderDto>() { Di2015NewLine            new OrderDto() { Id = 1, CustomerId = 1, ItemId = 1, Quantity = 3 },Di2015NewLine            new OrderDto() { Id = 1, CustomerId = 1, ItemId = 1, Quantity = 5 },Di2015NewLine            new OrderDto() { Id = 1, CustomerId = 3, ItemId = 2, Quantity = 5 },Di2015NewLine            new OrderDto() { Id = 1, CustomerId = 3, ItemId = 3, Quantity = 5 },Di2015NewLine            new OrderDto() { Id = 1, CustomerId = 2, ItemId = 2, Quantity = 5 }Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        List<CustomerOrderDto> results = (from c in CustomersDi2015NewLine                                          from i in ItemsDi2015NewLine                                          join o in Orders onDi2015NewLine                                            new { c.CustomerId, i.ItemId } equalsDi2015NewLine                                            new { o.CustomerId, o.ItemId } into ojDi2015NewLine                                          from o in oj.DefaultIfEmpty()Di2015NewLine                                          let x = o ?? new OrderDto() { CustomerId = c.CustomerId, ItemId = i.ItemId, Quantity = 0 }Di2015NewLine                                          group x by new { x.CustomerId, x.ItemId } into gDi2015NewLine                                          select new CustomerOrderDto() {Di2015NewLine                                              CustomerId = g.Key.CustomerId,Di2015NewLine                                              ItemId = g.Key.ItemId,Di2015NewLine                                              TotalQuantity = g.Select(x => x.Quantity).Sum()Di2015NewLine                                          }Di2015NewLine                                          ).ToList();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var result in results) {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Customer {0} purchased {1} units of item {2}",Di2015NewLine                result.CustomerId, result.TotalQuantity, result.ItemId);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey(true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15181072Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication2Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    internal class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var sentences = new List<string>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                "Little Red Riding Hood",Di2015NewLine                "Three Little Pigs",Di2015NewLine                "Jack and the Beanstalk"Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var sentence in sentences)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("----------------------------------");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (var permutation in Permute(sentence.Split(' ')))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    foreach (string word in permutation)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Console.Write(word + " ");Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // If you want to put all the permutations for all the sentences into a List<string>, you can just do this:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            List<string> permutations = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var sentence in sentences)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                permutations.AddRange(Permute(sentence.Split(' ')).Select(perm => string.Join(" ", perm)));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("The total number of perms is: " + permutations.Count);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Provides a sequence of enumerators for obtaining all permutations of a sequence.Di2015NewLine        /// Each enumeration in the returned sequence itself enumerates one of the permutations of the input sequence.Di2015NewLine        /// Use two nested foreach statements to visit each item in each permuted sequence.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> Permute<T>(IEnumerable<T> sequence)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return permute(sequence, sequence.Count());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Returns an enumeration of enumerators, one for each permutation of the input.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> permute<T>(IEnumerable<T> sequence, int count)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (count == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return new T[0];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int startingElementIndex = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (T startingElement in sequence)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    IEnumerable<T> remainingItems = allExcept(sequence, startingElementIndex);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    foreach (IEnumerable<T> permutationOfRemainder in permute(remainingItems, count - 1))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        yield return concat<T>(new T[] { startingElement }, permutationOfRemainder);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    ++startingElementIndex;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Implements the recursive part of Permute<T>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void permute<T>(T[] items, int item, T[] permutation, bool[] used, Action<T[]> output)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < items.Length; ++i)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!used[i])Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    used[i] = true;Di2015NewLine                    permutation[item] = items[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (item < (items.Length - 1))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        permute(items, item + 1, permutation, used, output);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        output(permutation);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    used[i] = false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Enumerates over all items in the input, skipping over the item with the specified index.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static IEnumerable<T> allExcept<T>(IEnumerable<T> input, int indexToSkip)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int index = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (T item in input)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (index != indexToSkip)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    yield return item;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                ++index;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Enumerates over contents of two lists sequentially.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static IEnumerable<T> concat<T>(IEnumerable<T> a, IEnumerable<T> b)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (T item in a)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return item;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (T item in b)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return item;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15181628Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineusing System.Security.AccessControl;Di2015NewLineusing System.Security.Principal;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.InteropServices;   //GuidAttributeDi2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;                //AssemblyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ITXClimateSaverWebAppDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class GlobalNamedLockDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private Mutex mtx;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public GlobalNamedLock(string strLockName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        //Name must be provided!Di2015NewLine            if(string.IsNullOrWhiteSpace(strLockName))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Use default nameDi2015NewLine                strLockName = ((GuidAttribute)Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().GetCustomAttributes(typeof(GuidAttribute), false).GetValue(0)).Value.ToString();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Create security permissions for everyoneDi2015NewLine            //It is needed in case the mutex is used by a process withDi2015NewLine            //different set of privileges than the one that created itDi2015NewLine            //Setting it will avoid access_denied errors.Di2015NewLine            MutexSecurity mSec = new MutexSecurity();Di2015NewLine            mSec.AddAccessRule(new MutexAccessRule(new SecurityIdentifier(WellKnownSidType.WorldSid, null),Di2015NewLine                MutexRights.FullControl, AccessControlType.Allow));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Create the global mutexDi2015NewLine            bool bCreatedNew;Di2015NewLine            mtx = new Mutex(false, @"Global\\" + strLockName, out bCreatedNew, mSec);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool enterCRITICAL_SECTION()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Enter critical sectionDi2015NewLine            //INFO: May throw an exception!Di2015NewLine            //RETURN:Di2015NewLine            //      = 'true' if successfully enteredDi2015NewLine            //      = 'false' if failed (DO NOT continue!)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //WaitDi2015NewLine            return mtx.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void leaveCRITICAL_SECTION()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Leave critical sectionDi2015NewLine            //INFO: May throw an exception!Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Release itDi2015NewLine            mtx.ReleaseMutex();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15184146Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass MachineDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    short a, b, c, d;Di2015NewLine    short[] ram = new short[0x10000];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    enum AddressTypeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Register,Di2015NewLine        DirectMemory,Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Gives the address for an operand or for the result.Di2015NewLine    // `addressType`and `addrCode` are extracted from instruction opcodeDi2015NewLine    // `regPointers` and `ramPointer` are fixed pointers to registers and RAM.Di2015NewLine    private unsafe short* GetAddress(AddressType addressType, short addrCode, short*[] regPointers, short* ramPointer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (addressType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case AddressType.Register:Di2015NewLine                return regPointers[addrCode]; //just an example implementationDi2015NewLine            case AddressType.DirectMemory:Di2015NewLine                return ramPointer + addrCode; //just an example implementationDi2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public unsafe void tick()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        fixed (short* ap = &a, bp = &b, cp = &c, dp = &d, ramPointer = ram)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            short*[] regPointers = new short*[] { ap, bp, cp, dp };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            short* pOperand1, pOperand2, pResult;Di2015NewLine            AddressType operand1AddrType, operand2AddrType, resultAddrType;Di2015NewLine            short operand1AddrCode, operand2AddrCode, resultAddrCode;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // ... decipher the instruction and extract the address types and codesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            pOperand1 = GetAddress(operand1AddrType, operand1AddrCode, regPointers, ramPointer);Di2015NewLine            pOperand2 = GetAddress(operand2AddrType, operand2AddrCode, regPointers, ramPointer);Di2015NewLine            pResult = GetAddress(resultAddrType, resultAddrCode, regPointers, ramPointer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // execute the instruction, using `*pOperand1` and `*pOperand2`, storing the result in `*pResult`.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15185392Di2015UniqueSeparatorunsigned int v; // count bits set in this (32-bit value)Di2015NewLineunsigned int c; // store the total hereDi2015NewLinestatic const int S[] = {1, 2, 4, 8, 16}; // Magic Binary NumbersDi2015NewLinestatic const int B[] = {0x55555555, 0x33333333, 0x0F0F0F0F, 0x00FF00FF, 0x0000FFFF};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinec = v - ((v >> 1) & B[0]);Di2015NewLinec = ((c >> S[1]) & B[1]) + (c & B[1]);Di2015NewLinec = ((c >> S[2]) + c) & B[2];Di2015NewLinec = ((c >> S[3]) + c) & B[3];Di2015NewLinec = ((c >> S[4]) + c) & B[4];Di2015NewLine
15185392Di2015UniqueSeparatorB[0] = 0x55555555 = 01010101 01010101 01010101 01010101Di2015NewLineB[1] = 0x33333333 = 00110011 00110011 00110011 00110011Di2015NewLineB[2] = 0x0F0F0F0F = 00001111 00001111 00001111 00001111Di2015NewLineB[3] = 0x00FF00FF = 00000000 11111111 00000000 11111111Di2015NewLineB[4] = 0x0000FFFF = 00000000 00000000 11111111 11111111Di2015NewLine

15185601Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class DiskStream : StreamDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public const int DEFAULT_SECTOR_SIZE = 512;Di2015NewLine    private const int BUFFER_SIZE = fileHandle;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DiskInfo DiskInfoDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return this.diskInfo; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public uint SectorSizeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return this.diskInfo.BytesPerSector; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DiskStream(string diskID, FileAccess desiredAccess)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.diskID = diskID;Di2015NewLine        this.diskInfo = new DiskInfo(diskID);Di2015NewLine        this.desiredAccess = desiredAccess;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // if desiredAccess is Write or Read/WriteDi2015NewLine        //   find volumes on this diskDi2015NewLine        //   lock the volumes using desiredAccess);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private SafeFileHandle openFile(string id, FileAccess desiredAccess)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        uint access;Di2015NewLine        switch (desiredAccess)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case FileAccess.Read:Di2015NewLine                access = DeviceIO.GENERIC_READ;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case FileAccess.Write:Di2015NewLine                access = DeviceIO.GENERIC_WRITE;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case FileAccess.ReadWrite:Di2015NewLine                access = DeviceIO.GENERIC_READ | DeviceIO.GENERIC_WRITE;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                access = DeviceIO.GENERIC_READ;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        SafeFileHandle ptr = DeviceIO.CreateFile(Di2015NewLine            id,Di2015NewLine            access,Di2015NewLine            DeviceIO.FILE_SHARE_READ,Di2015NewLine            IntPtr.Zero,Di2015NewLine            DeviceIO.OPEN_EXISTING,Di2015NewLine    Marshal.ThrowExceptionForHR(Marshal.GetHRForLastWin32Error());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return ptr;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override bool CanWriteDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (this.desiredAccess == FileAccess.Write || this.desiredAccess == FileAccess.ReadWrite) ? true : false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override bool CanSeekDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override long Length {Di2015NewLine      get { 15186496Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid GeneratePreview<T>(int itemsPerPage)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var printAbleListView = (ListView)printObject.FindName("printAbleListView");Di2015NewLine    var allItems = (ObservableCollection<T>)printAbleListView.DataContext;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Add the page to the page preview collectionDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i <= (allItems.Count()/itemsPerPage); i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      printAbleListView.DataContext =Di2015NewLine              allItems.Skip(itemsPerPage * i).Take(itemsPerPage);Di2015NewLine      document.SetPreviewPage((i + 1), printObject);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15186496Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid GeneratePreview(int itemsPerPage)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var printAbleListView = (ListView)printObject.FindName("printAbleListView");Di2015NewLine    var allItems = (ICollection)printAbleListView.DataContext;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var slice = new List<object>(itemsPerPage); // cannot use ArrayList for Win8 appsDi2015NewLine    var pageNo = 1;Di2015NewLine    foreach (var item in allItems)Di2015NewLine    {            Di2015NewLine        slice.Add(item);Di2015NewLine        if (slice.Count % itemsPerPage == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // flushDi2015NewLine            printAbleListView.DataContext = slice;Di2015NewLine            document.SetPreviewPage(pageNo, printObject);Di2015NewLine            // and restartDi2015NewLine            pageNo++;Di2015NewLine            slice.Clear();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (slice.Count != 0) // flush the restDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        printAbleListView.DataContext = slice;Di2015NewLine        document.SetPreviewPage(pageNo, printObject);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // clean upDi2015NewLine    printAbleListView.DataContext = null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15188372Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static async Task doThing(object i) {Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("in do thing {0}", (int)i);Di2015NewLine    await Task.Delay(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(5));Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("out of do thing {0}", (int)i);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine    CancellationTokenSource source = new CancellationTokenSource();Di2015NewLine    var exclusivityBlock = new ActionBlock<Func<Task>>(f => f(), new ExecutionDataflowBlockOptions { CancellationToken = source.Token }};Di2015NewLine    exclusivityBlock.Post(() => doThing(1));Di2015NewLine    exclusivityBlock.Post(() => doThing(2));Di2015NewLine    exclusivityBlock.Post(() => doThing(3));Di2015NewLine    exclusivityBlock.Post(Di2015NewLine        async () => {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("in do thing {0}", 4);Di2015NewLine            await Task.Delay(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(5));Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("out of do thing {0}", 4);Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    exclusivityBlock.Complete();Di2015NewLine    exclusivityBlock.Completion.Wait();Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Done");Di2015NewLine    Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine    return;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15188372Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal static class Program {Di2015NewLine    private static async Task doThing(object i) {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("in do thing {0}", (int)i);Di2015NewLine        await Task.Delay(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(5));Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("out of do thing {0}", (int)i);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine        CancellationTokenSource source = new CancellationTokenSource();Di2015NewLine        var exclusivityBlock =         });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Task.WaitAll(task1, task2, task3, task4);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Done");Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static ActionBlock<Tuple<T, TaskCompletionSource<object>>> CreateTrackingBlock<T>(Func<T, Task> action, ExecutionDataflowBlockOptions options = null) {Di2015NewLine        return new ActionBlock<Tuple<T, TaskCompletionSource<object>>>(Di2015NewLine            async tuple => {Di2015NewLine                try {Di2015NewLine                    await action(tuple.Item1);Di2015NewLine                    tuple.Item2.TrySetResult(null);Di2015NewLine                } catch (Exception ex) {Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal static Task PostWithCompletion<T>(this ActionBlock<Tuple<T, TaskCompletionSource<object>>> block, T value) {Di2015NewLine        var tcs = new TaskCompletionSource<object>();Di2015NewLine        var tuple = Tuple.Create(value, tcs);Di2015NewLine        block.Post(tuple);Di2015NewLine        return tcs.Task;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15191380Di2015UniqueSeparator    private DependencyObject FindChildControl<T>(DependencyObject control, string ctrlName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int childNumber = VisualTreeHelper.GetChildrenCount(control);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < childNumber; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DependencyObject child = VisualTreeHelper.GetChild(control, i);Di2015NewLine            FrameworkElement fe = child as FrameworkElement;Di2015NewLine            // Not a framework element or is nullDi2015NewLine            if (fe == null) return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (child is T && fe.Name == ctrlName)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Found the control so returnDi2015NewLine                return child;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Not found it - search childrenDi2015NewLine                DependencyObject nextLevel = FindChildControl<T>(child, ctrlName);Di2015NewLine                if (nextLevel != null)Di2015NewLine                    return nextLevel;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

15191605Di2015UniqueSeparatorString sourcestring = "source string to match with pattern";Di2015NewLineRegex re = new Regex(@"^(?:(?:https?|ftp)://)(?:\\S+(?::\\S*)?@)?(?:(?!10(?:\\.\\d{1,3}){3})(?!127(?:\\.\\d{1,3}){3})(?!169\\.254(?:\\.\\d{1,3}){2})(?!192\\.168(?:\\.\\d{1,3}){2})(?!172\\.(?:1[6-9]|2\\d|3[0-1])(?:\\.\\d{1,3}){2})(?:[1-9]\\d?|1\\d\\d|2[01]\\d|22[0-3])(?:\\.(?:1?\\d{1,2}|2[0-4]\\d|25[0-5])){2}(?:\\.(?:[1-9]\\d?|1\\d\\d|2[0-4]\\d|25[0-4]))|(?:(?:[a-z\\u00a1-\\uffff0-9]+-?)*[a-z\\u00a1-\\uffff0-9]+)(?:\\.(?:[a-z\\u00a1-\\uffff0-9]+-?)*[a-z\\u00a1-\\uffff0-9]+)*(?:\\.(?:[a-z\\u00a1-\\uffff]{2,})))(?::\\d{2,5})?(?:/[^\\s]*)?$",RegexOptions.IgnoreCase | RegexOptions.Multiline);Di2015NewLineMatch m = re.Match(sourcestring);Di2015NewLinefor (int gIdx = 0; gIdx < m.Groups.Count; gIdx++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   Console.WriteLine("[{0}] = {1}", re.GetGroupNames()[gIdx], m.Groups[gIdx].Value);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15192069Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static void LogicalEraseLine(string filename, int toDel)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        FileStream fs = new FileStream(filename, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.ReadWrite);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        fs.Seek(toDel, SeekOrigin.Current);Di2015NewLine        int c;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while ((c = fs.ReadByte()) != -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (c == '\\n')Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                fs.Seek(-1, SeekOrigin.Current);Di2015NewLine                fs.WriteByte((byte)'\\n');Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        fs.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
15192069Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static void Cleanup (string filename)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        FileStream input = new FileStream(filename, FileMode.Open, FileAccess.Read);Di2015NewLine        FileStream output = new FileStream(filename + ".tmp", FileMode.Create, FileAccess.Write);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bool emptyLine = true;Di2015NewLine        int c;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while ((c = input.ReadByte()) != -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (c == '\\n')Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!emptyLine)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    output.WriteByte((byte)c);Di2015NewLine                    emptyLine = true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                output.WriteByte((byte)c);Di2015NewLine                emptyLine = false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        input.Close();Di2015NewLine        output.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        File.Delete (filename);Di2015NewLine        File.Copy(filename + ".tmp", filename);Di2015NewLine        File.Delete(filename + ".tmp");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

15195765Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static List<object> _lst;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Task tsk =  new Task(() => _lst = new List<object>()); //task will create new thread if available and execute the Action.Di2015NewLine        tsk.Start(); //initiates task, which initiates new List<object> on new thread.Di2015NewLine        tsk.Wait(); //waits for task to complete. 15202170Di2015UniqueSeparatorpartial void OnContextCreated()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  // change connection string, depending on subdomainDi2015NewLine  if (HttpContext.Current == null) return;Di2015NewLine  var host = HttpContext.Current.Request.Url.Host;Di2015NewLine  var subdomain = host.Split('.')[0];Di2015NewLine  switch (subdomain)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    case "foo":Di2015NewLine      ChangeDB("Foo");Di2015NewLine      break;Di2015NewLine    case "bar":Di2015NewLine      ChangeDB("Bar");Di2015NewLine      break;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void ChangeDB(string dbName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var ec = Connection as EntityConnection;Di2015NewLine  if (ec == null) return;Di2015NewLine  var match = Regex.Match(ec.StoreConnection.ConnectionString, @"Initial Catalog\\s*=.*?;", RegexOptions.IgnoreCase);Di2015NewLine  if (!match.Success) return;Di2015NewLine  var newDbString = "initial catalog={0};".Fmt(dbName);Di2015NewLine  ec.StoreConnection.ConnectionString = ec.StoreConnection.ConnectionString.Replace(match.Value, newDbString);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15203215Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static MethodInfo handleAsync = ...; // point this to HandleAsync<T>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Only called if the return type is Task/Task<T>Di2015NewLineprivate static object InvokeAsyncOnChannel(IMethodInvocation methodInvocation)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var proxy = _factory.CreateChannel();Di2015NewLine    var channel = (IChannel) proxy;Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        channel.Open();Di2015NewLine        var task = methodInvocation.Method.Invoke(proxy, methodInvocation.Arguments) as Task;Di2015NewLine        object ret;Di2015NewLine        if (task.GetType() == typeof(Task))Di2015NewLine            ret = HandleAsync(task, channel);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            ret = handleAsync.MakeGenericMethod(task.GetType().GetGenericParameters()).Invoke(this, task, channel);Di2015NewLine        return ret;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (FaultException ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ex.InnerException != null)Di2015NewLine            throw ex.InnerException;Di2015NewLine        throw;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch(Exception)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        channel.Abort();Di2015NewLine        throw;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static async Task HandleAsync(Task task, IChannel channel)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        await task;Di2015NewLine        channel.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (FaultException ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ex.InnerException != null)Di2015NewLine            throw ex.InnerException;Di2015NewLine        throw;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch(Exception)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        channel.Abort();Di2015NewLine        throw;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static async Task<T> HandleAsync<T>(Task task, IChannel channel)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var ret = await (Task<T>)task;Di2015NewLine        channel.Close();Di2015NewLine        return ret;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (FaultException ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ex.InnerException != null)Di2015NewLine            throw ex.InnerException;Di2015NewLine        throw;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch(Exception)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        channel.Abort();Di2015NewLine        throw;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15203215Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static object InvokeOnChannel(IMethodInvocation methodInvocation)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var proxy = _factory.CreateChannel();Di2015NewLine    var channel = (IChannel) proxy;Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        channel.Open();Di2015NewLine        dynamic result = methodInvocation.Method.Invoke(proxy, methodInvocation.Arguments);Di2015NewLine        return Handle(result, channel);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (FaultException ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ex.InnerException != null)Di2015NewLine            throw ex.InnerException;Di2015NewLine        throw;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch(Exception)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        channel.Abort();Di2015NewLine        throw;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static async Task Handle(Task task, IChannel channel)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        await task;Di2015NewLine        channel.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (FaultException ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ex.InnerException != null)Di2015NewLine            throw ex.InnerException;Di2015NewLine        throw;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch(Exception)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        channel.Abort();Di2015NewLine        throw;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static async Task<T> Handle<T>(Task<T> task, IChannel channel)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    await Handle((Task)task, channel);Di2015NewLine    return await task;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static T Handle<T>(T result, IChannel channel)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    channel.Close();Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15206183Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic int SendMultipleMessages(Queue<Message> messages)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  while (messages.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     var message = messages.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine     // do something with message, and once you're done it isDi2015NewLine     // probably eligible for garbage collection because it isDi2015NewLine     // no longer in the QueueDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Task.Factory.StartNew(() =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //very time demanding taskDi2015NewLine            _sendRequestHandler.SendMultipleMessages(BatchId);Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine return BatchId;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15209681Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void RunMatchingAlgorithm() {Di2015NewLine    foreach (var databaseRow in dtFromTableContracts.Rows) {Di2015NewLine        string partNumber2 = databaseRow["supplier_part_no"].ToString();Di2015NewLine        string contract_no2 = databaseRow["contract_no"].ToString();Di2015NewLine        DateTime expiration_date2 = Convert.ToDateTime(databaseRow["con_end_date"]).Date;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var excelRow in dtConversion.Rows) {Di2015NewLine            string contract_no = excelRow["vend_contract_no"].ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //If we have even a partial match, check for a part number matchDi2015NewLine            if (contract_no2.StartsWith(contract_no)) {Di2015NewLine                string partNumber = excelRow["vend_item_id"].ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //If the values match, populate from both tablesDi2015NewLine                if (partNumber == partNumber2) {Di2015NewLine                    excelRow["wpd_expiration_date"] = expiration_date2.Date;Di2015NewLine                    excelRow["wpd_cont_cost"] = databaseRow["contract_cost"];Di2015NewLine                    excelRow["wpd_contract_no"] = databaseRow["contract_no"];Di2015NewLine                    excelRow["wpd_item_id"] = databaseRow["supplier_part_no"];Di2015NewLine                    excelRow["wpd_item_no"] = databaseRow["item_id"];Di2015NewLine                    excelRow["discontinued"] = databaseRow["discontinued"];Di2015NewLine                    excelRow["job_no"] = databaseRow["job_no"];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15209681Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void RunMatchingAlgorithm() {Di2015NewLine    var matches = from databaseRow in dtFromTableContracts.RowsDi2015NewLine                  let partNumber2 = databaseRow["supplier_part_no"].ToString()Di2015NewLine                  let contract_no2 = databaseRow["contract_no"].ToString()Di2015NewLine                  let expiration_date2 = Convert.ToDateTime(databaseRow["con_end_date"]).DateDi2015NewLine                  from excelRow in dtConversion.RowsDi2015NewLine                  let contract_no = excelRow["vend_contract_no"].ToString()Di2015NewLine                  where contract_no2.StartsWith(contract_no)Di2015NewLine                  let partNumber = excelRow["vend_item_id"].ToString()Di2015NewLine                  where partNumber == partNumber2Di2015NewLine                  select new { databaseRow, excelRow, expiration_date2 }Di2015NewLine    foreach (var m in matches) {Di2015NewLine        var dst = m.excelRow;Di2015NewLine        var src = m.databaseRow;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        dst["wpd_expiration_date"] = m.expiration_date2.Date;Di2015NewLine        dst["wpd_cont_cost"] = src["contract_cost"];Di2015NewLine        dst["wpd_contract_no"] = src["contract_no"];Di2015NewLine        dst["wpd_item_id"] = src["supplier_part_no"];Di2015NewLine        dst["wpd_item_no"] = src["item_id"];Di2015NewLine        dst["discontinued"] = src["discontinued"];Di2015NewLine        dst["job_no"] = src["job_no"];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15209681Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void RunMatchingAlgorithm() {Di2015NewLine    var matches = from databaseRow in dtFromTableContracts.RowsDi2015NewLine                  join excelRow in dtConversion.RowsDi2015NewLine                  on excelRow["vend_item_id"].ToString() equals databaseRow["supplier_part_no"].ToString()Di2015NewLine                  where databaseRow["contract_no"].ToString().StartsWith(excelRow["vend_contract_no"].ToString())Di2015NewLine                  select new { databaseRow, excelRow }Di2015NewLine    foreach (var m in matches) {Di2015NewLine        var dst = m.excelRow;Di2015NewLine        var src = m.databaseRow;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        dst["wpd_expiration_date"] = Convert.ToDateTime(src["con_end_date"]).Date;Di2015NewLine        dst["wpd_cont_cost"] = src["contract_cost"];Di2015NewLine        dst["wpd_contract_no"] = src["contract_no"];Di2015NewLine        dst["wpd_item_id"] = src["supplier_part_no"];Di2015NewLine        dst["wpd_item_no"] = src["item_id"];Di2015NewLine        dst["discontinued"] = src["discontinued"];Di2015NewLine        dst["job_no"] = src["job_no"];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15210094Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary> Returns the elements of the first sequence, or the values in the second sequence if the first sequence is empty. </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="first"> The first sequence. </param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="second"> The second sequence. </param>Di2015NewLine/// <typeparam name="T"> The type of elements in the sequence. </typeparam>Di2015NewLine/// <returns> The <see cref="IObservable{T}"/> sequence. </returns>Di2015NewLinepublic static IObservable<T> DefaultIfEmpty<T>(this IObservable<T> first, IObservable<T> second)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var signal = new AsyncSubject<Unit>();Di2015NewLine    var source1 = first.Do(item => { signal.OnNext(Unit.Default); signal.OnCompleted(); });Di2015NewLine    var source2 = second.TakeUntil(signal);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return source1.Concat(source2); // if source2 is cold, it won't invoke it until source1 is completedDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15210094Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar signal1 = new AsyncSubject<Unit>();Di2015NewLinevar signal2 = new AsyncSubject<Unit>();Di2015NewLinevar source1 = a.Do(item => { signal1.onNext(Unit.Default); signal1.onCompleted(); });Di2015NewLinevar source2 = b.Do(item => { signal2.onNext(Unit.Default); signal2.onCompleted(); })).TakeUntil(signal1);Di2015NewLinevar source3 = c.TakeUntil(signal2.Merge(signal1));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinereturn Observable.Concat(source1, source2, source3);Di2015NewLine
15210094Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar gotResult = false;Di2015NewLinevar source1 = a();Di2015NewLinevar source2 = Observable.Defer(() => return gotResult ? Observable.Empty<T>() : b());Di2015NewLinevar source3 = Observable.Defer(() => return gotResult ? Observable.Empty<T>() : c());Di2015NewLinereturn Observable.Concat(source1, source2, source3).Do(_ => gotResult = true;);Di2015NewLine

15213358Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static LambdaExpression ChangeInputType<T, TResult>(Expression<Func<T, TResult>> expression, Type newInputType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!typeof(T).IsAssignableFrom(newInputType))Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception(string.Format("{0} is not assignable from {1}.", typeof(T), newInputType));Di2015NewLine        var beforeParameter = expression.Parameters.Single();Di2015NewLine        var afterParameter = Expression.Parameter(newInputType, beforeParameter.Name);Di2015NewLine        var visitor = new SubstitutionExpressionVisitor(beforeParameter, afterParameter);Di2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda(visitor.Visit(expression.Body), afterParameter);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Expression<Func<T2, TResult>> ChangeInputType<T1, T2, TResult>(Expression<Func<T1, TResult>> expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!typeof(T1).IsAssignableFrom(typeof(T2)))Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception(string.Format("{0} is not assignable from {1}.", typeof(T1), typeof(T2)));Di2015NewLine        var beforeParameter = expression.Parameters.Single();Di2015NewLine        var afterParameter = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T2), beforeParameter.Name);Di2015NewLine        var visitor = new SubstitutionExpressionVisitor(beforeParameter, afterParameter);Di2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<Func<T2, TResult>>(visitor.Visit(expression.Body), afterParameter);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class SubstitutionExpressionVisitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private Expression before, after;Di2015NewLine        public SubstitutionExpressionVisitor(Expression before, Expression after)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.before = before;Di2015NewLine            this.after = after;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public override Expression Visit(Expression node)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return node == before ? after : base.Visit(node);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

15213544Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid Main()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var bugCount = 4;Di2015NewLine    var window = System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader.Parse(someXaml) Di2015NewLine            as System.Windows.Window;Di2015NewLine    window.Show();Di2015NewLine    var canvas = window.FindName("canvas") Di2015NewLine            as System.Windows.Controls.Canvas;Di2015NewLine    var bugs = new List<Bug>();Di2015NewLine    var r = new Random();Di2015NewLine    if(canvas != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for(int i=0; Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case 1: Di2015NewLine                bug.Location = Di2015NewLine                    new System.Windows.Point(bug.Location.X - 1, bug.Location.Y); Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case 2: Di2015NewLine                bug.Location = Di2015NewLine                    new System.Windows.Point(bug.Location.X, bug.Location.Y + 1); Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case 3: Di2015NewLine                bug.Location = Di2015NewLine                    new System.Windows.Point(bug.Location.X, bug.Location.Y - 1); Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Bug : System.Windows.Controls.UserControlDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static int _bugCounter = 0;Di2015NewLine    public Bug()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.BugId = _bugCounter++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public int BugId {get;            Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void OnRender(System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext ctx)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.OnRender(ctx);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Yo, bug #{0} is rendering!", BugId);Di2015NewLine        ctx.DrawRectangle(Di2015NewLine            System.Windows.Media.Brushes.Red, Di2015NewLine            new System.Windows.Media.Pen(System.Windows.Media.Brushes.White, 1), Di2015NewLine            new System.Windows.Rect(Location, this.RenderSize));Di2015NewLine        var formattedText = new System.Windows.Media.FormattedText(Di2015NewLine            this.BugId.ToString(), Di2015NewLine            System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture, Di2015NewLine            System.Windows.FlowDirection.LeftToRight, Di2015NewLine            new System.Windows.Media.Typeface("Arial"), Di2015NewLine            12, Di2015NewLine            System.Windows.Media.Brushes.White);Di2015NewLine        ctx.DrawText(Di2015NewLine            formattedText, Di2015NewLine            new System.Windows.Point(Location.X + 10, Location.Y + 10));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestring someXaml =Di2015NewLine@"Di2015NewLine<WindowDi2015NewLine    xmlns=""http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation""Di2015NewLine    xmlns:x=""http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml""Di2015NewLine    Width=""320""Di2015NewLine    Height=""240""Di2015NewLine>Di2015NewLine    <Canvas Di2015NewLine        x:Name=""canvas""Di2015NewLine        Width=""640""Di2015NewLine        Height=""480""Di2015NewLine        Background=""LightGray""Di2015NewLine    />Di2015NewLine</Window>        Di2015NewLine";Di2015NewLine
