15215849Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static readonly ZoneLocalMappingResolver CustomResolver = Di2015NewLine    Resolvers.CreateMappingResolver(Resolvers.ReturnLater, AddGap);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// SkippedTimeResolver which adds the length of the gap to theDi2015NewLine// local date and time.Di2015NewLineprivate static ZonedDateTime AddGap(LocalDateTime localDateTime,Di2015NewLine                                    DateTimeZone zone,Di2015NewLine                                    ZoneInterval intervalBefore,Di2015NewLine                                    ZoneInterval intervalAfter)        Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    long afterMillis = intervalAfter.WallOffset.Milliseconds;Di2015NewLine    long beforeMillis = intervalBefore.WallOffset.Milliseconds;Di2015NewLine    Period gap = Period.FromMilliseconds(afterMillis - beforeMillis);Di2015NewLine    return zone.AtStrictly(localDateTime + gap);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15216062Di2015UniqueSeparator//Here you will store the duplicated personDi2015NewLine//Key: The person IdDi2015NewLine//Value: The list of person sharing that same IdDi2015NewLineDictionary<string, IList<Person>> duplicatedPeople;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineif(!this.PersonDataCollection.ContainsKey(personKey))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    this.PersonDataCollection.Add(objPerson);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineelseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Here we store all the people with this already existing IDDi2015NewLine    IList<Person> duplicatedPeople;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //If we already have this ID in the dictionary of repeated peopleDi2015NewLine    if (this.duplicatedPeople.TryGetValue(personKey, out duplicatedPeople)) {Di2015NewLine        //Just add this new personDi2015NewLine        duplicatedPeople.Add(objPerson);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //If this is the 1st time we found a duplicated person with this IDDi2015NewLine    else {Di2015NewLine        //We add two persons to the list: this one, and the one from PersonDataCollection.Di2015NewLine        duplicatedPeople = new List<Person> { this.PersonDataCollection[personKey], objPerson };Di2015NewLine        //Add it to the dictionaryDi2015NewLine        this.duplicatedPeople.Add(personKey, duplicatedPeople);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15217671Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class HtmlUtilityDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Original list courtesy of Robert Beal :Di2015NewLine    // http://www.robertbeal.com/37/sanitising-htmlDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static readonly Dictionary<string, string[]> ValidHtmlTags =Di2015NewLine        new Dictionary<string, string[]>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            {"p", new string[]          {"style", "class", "align"}},Di2015NewLine            {"div", new string[]        {"style", "class", "align"}},Di2015NewLine            {"span", new string[]       {"style", "class"}},Di2015NewLine            {"br", new string[]         {"style", "class"}},Di2015NewLine            {"hr", new string[]         {"style", "class"}},Di2015NewLine            {"label", new string[]      {"style", "class"}},Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            {"h1", new string[]         {"style", "class"}},Di2015NewLine            {"h2", new string[]         {"style", "class"}},Di2015NewLine            {"h3", new string[]         {"style", "class"}},Di2015NewLine            {"h4", new string[]         {"style", "class"}},Di2015NewLine            {"h5", new string[]         {"style", "class"}},Di2015NewLine            {"h6", new string[]         {"style", "class"}},Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            {"font", new string[]       {"style", "class", "color", "face", "size"}},Di2015NewLine            {"strong", new string[]     {"style", "class"}},Di2015NewLine            {"b", new string[]          {"style", "class"}},Di2015NewLine            {"em", new string[]         {"style", "class"}},Di2015NewLine            {"i", new string[]          {"style", "class"}},Di2015NewLine            {"u", new string[]          {"style", "class"}},Di2015NewLine            {"strike", new string[]     {"style", "class"}},Di2015NewLine            {"ol", new string[]         {"style", "class"}},Di2015NewLine            {"ul", new string[]         {"style", "class"}},Di2015NewLine            {"li", new string[]         {"style", "class"}},Di2015NewLine            {"blockquote", new string[] {"style", "class"}},Di2015NewLine            {"code", new string[]       {"style", "class"}},Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            {"a", new string[]          {"style", "class", "href", "title"}},Di2015NewLine            {"img", new string[]        {"style", "class", "src", "height", "width",Di2015NewLine                "alt", "title", "hspace", "vspace", "border"}},Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            {"table", new string[]      {"style", "class"}},Di2015NewLine            {"thead", new string[]      {"style", "class"}},Di2015NewLine            {"tbody", new string[]      {"style", "class"}},Di2015NewLine            {"tfoot", new string[]      {"style", "class"}},Di2015NewLine            {"th", new string[]         {"style", "class", "scope"}},Di2015NewLine            {"tr", new string[]         {"style", "class"}},Di2015NewLine            {"td", new string[]         {"style", "class", "colspan"}},Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            {"q", new string[]          {"style", "class", "cite"}},Di2015NewLine            {"cite", new string[]       {"style", "class"}},Di2015NewLine            {"abbr", new string[]       {"style", "class"}},Di2015NewLine            {"acronym", new string[]    {"style", "class"}},Di2015NewLine            {"del", new string[]        {"style", "class"}},Di2015NewLine            {"ins", new string[]        {"style", "class"}}Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Takes raw HTML input and cleans against a whitelistDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="source">Html source</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Clean output</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static string SanitizeHtml(string source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        HtmlDocument html = GetHtml(source);Di2015NewLine        if (html == null) return String.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // All the nodesDi2015NewLine        HtmlNode allNodes = html.DocumentNode;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Select whitelist tag namesDi2015NewLine        string[] whitelist = (from kv in ValidHtmlTagsDi2015NewLine                              select kv.Key).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Scrub tags not in whitelistDi2015NewLine        CleanNodes(allNodes, whitelist);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Filter the attributes of the remainingDi2015NewLine        foreach (KeyValuePair<string, string[]> tag in ValidHtmlTags)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IEnumerable<HtmlNode> nodes = (from n in allNodes.DescendantsAndSelf()Di2015NewLine                                           where n.Name == tag.KeyDi2015NewLine                                           select n);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (nodes == null) continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var n in nodes)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!n.HasAttributes) continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Get all the allowed attributes for this tagDi2015NewLine                HtmlAttribute[] attr = n.Attributes.ToArray();Di2015NewLine                foreach (HtmlAttribute a in attr)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (!tag.Value.Contains(a.Name))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        a.Remove(); // Wasn't in the listDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // AntiXssDi2015NewLine                        a.Value =Di2015NewLine                            Microsoft.Security.Application.Encoder.UrlPathEncode(a.Value);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return allNodes.InnerHtml;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Takes a raw source and removes all HTML tagsDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="source"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static string StripHtml(string source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        source = SanitizeHtml(source);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // No need to continue if we have no clean HtmlDi2015NewLine        if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(source))Di2015NewLine            return String.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        HtmlDocument html = GetHtml(source);Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder result = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // For each node, extract only the innerTextDi2015NewLine        foreach (HtmlNode node in html.DocumentNode.ChildNodes)Di2015NewLine            result.Append(node.InnerText);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Recursively delete nodes not in the whitelistDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private static void CleanNodes(HtmlNode node, string[] whitelist)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (node.NodeType == HtmlNodeType.Element)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!whitelist.Contains(node.Name))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                node.ParentNode.RemoveChild(node);Di2015NewLine                return; // We're doneDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (node.HasChildNodes)Di2015NewLine            CleanChildren(node, whitelist);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Apply CleanNodes to each of the child nodesDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private static void CleanChildren(HtmlNode parent, string[] whitelist)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = parent.ChildNodes.Count - 1; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine            CleanNodes(parent.ChildNodes[i], whitelist);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Helper function that returns an HTML document from textDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private static HtmlDocument GetHtml(string source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        HtmlDocument html = new HtmlDocument();Di2015NewLine        html.OptionFixNestedTags = true;Di2015NewLine        html.OptionAutoCloseOnEnd = true;Di2015NewLine        html.OptionDefaultStreamEncoding = Encoding.UTF8;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        html.LoadHtml(source);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return html;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15219306Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static string FormatDefaultValue(object value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (value is bool)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return value.ToLocalString().ToLowerInvariant();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (value is string)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return value.ToLocalString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var asEnumerable = value as IEnumerable;Di2015NewLine    if (asEnumerable != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var builder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var item in asEnumerable)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            builder.Append(item.ToLocalString());Di2015NewLine            builder.Append(" ");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return builder.Length > 0 ? builder.ToString(0, builder.Length - 1) : string.Empty;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return value.ToLocalString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15219507Di2015UniqueSeparator<TextBox TextChanged="TextBoxBase_OnTextChanged" />Di2015NewLine
15219507Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void TextBoxBase_OnTextChanged(object sender, TextChangedEventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine    var textBox = sender as TextBox;Di2015NewLine    if (textBox != null) {Di2015NewLine        string newValue = textBox.Text;Di2015NewLine        int changed = ValidateText(ref newValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int selectionStart = textBox.SelectionStart;Di2015NewLine        textBox.Text = newValue;Di2015NewLine        textBox.SelectionStart = selectionStart - changed;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate int ValidateText(ref string input) {Di2015NewLine    // If no value, return empty stringDi2015NewLine    if (input == null) return 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int changed = 0;Di2015NewLine    // Go through input string and create new string that only contains digits and periodDi2015NewLine    StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    for (int index = 0; index < input.Length; index++) {Di2015NewLine        if (Char.IsDigit(input[index]) || input[index] == '.')Di2015NewLine            builder.Append(input[index]);Di2015NewLine        else changed++;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    input = builder.ToString();Di2015NewLine    return changed;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15219730Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class RequesterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static CookieContainer cookieJar = new CookieContainer();Di2015NewLine    static string userAgent = ""; //specify your user agentDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Static method to request a web page. Di2015NewLine    /// It acts like a browser which means that keeps all cookies for depending domain.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="URL"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    static public FinalResponse sendRequest(string URL)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return sendRequest(URL, "");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static public FinalResponse sendRequest(string URL, string parameters)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        FinalResponse result = new FinalResponse();Di2015NewLine        Stopwatch timer = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLine        HttpWebRequest request;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            request = (HttpWebRequest)HttpWebRequest.Create(URL);Di2015NewLine            request.Referer = "http://google.com"; //specify your refererDi2015NewLine            request.CookieContainer = cookieJar;Di2015NewLine            request.UserAgent = userAgent;Di2015NewLine            BugFix_CookieDomain();Di2015NewLine            request.AllowAutoRedirect = true;Di2015NewLine            if (parameters != "")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                request.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine                request.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLine                request.ContentLength = parameters.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //push parameters to request streamDi2015NewLine                StreamWriter myWriter = new StreamWriter(request.GetRequestStream());Di2015NewLine                myWriter.Write(parameters);Di2015NewLine                myWriter.Close();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            //send requestDi2015NewLine            result.requestTime = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine            timer.Start();Di2015NewLine            HttpWebResponse response = (HttpWebResponse)request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine            timer.Stop();Di2015NewLine            result.responseMilliseconds = timer.ElapsedMilliseconds;Di2015NewLine            BugFix_CookieDomain();Di2015NewLine            using (StreamReader sr = new StreamReader(response.GetResponseStream()))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result.document = sr.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine                sr.Close();Di2015NewLine                result.isSucceded = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(e.Message);Di2015NewLine            result.document = "";Di2015NewLine            result.isSucceded = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Call this function before all usage of cookieJar. Di2015NewLine    /// It fixes the bug (!) of CookieContainer Class. Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private static void BugFix_CookieDomain()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.Type _ContainerType = typeof(CookieContainer);Di2015NewLine        Hashtable table = (Hashtable)_ContainerType.InvokeMember("m_domainTable",Di2015NewLine                                   System.Reflection.BindingFlags.NonPublic |Di2015NewLine                                   System.Reflection.BindingFlags.GetField |Di2015NewLine                                   System.Reflection.BindingFlags.Instance,Di2015NewLine                                   null,Di2015NewLine                                   cookieJar,Di2015NewLine                                   new object[] { });Di2015NewLine        ArrayList keys = new ArrayList(table.Keys);Di2015NewLine        foreach (string keyObj in keys)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string key = (keyObj as string);Di2015NewLine            if (key[0] == '.')Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string newKey = key.Remove(0, 1);Di2015NewLine                table[newKey] = table[keyObj];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

15221279Di2015UniqueSeparator    public IEnumerable<dynamic> CreateData(ObservableCollection<ReportFieldVm> reportFields)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Find the length of the array.Di2015NewLine        var size = reportFields.Count;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create matrix.Di2015NewLine        var b = new int[size, size];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Random for the values.Di2015NewLine        var rand = new Random((int)DateTime.Now.Ticks);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Build the symmetric matrix.Di2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i < size; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (var j = 0; j < size; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (i == j)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    b[i,j] = rand.Next(0, 100);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var a = rand.Next(0, 100);Di2015NewLine                    b[i,j] = a;Di2015NewLine                    b[j,i] = a;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Define the assembly to add out new type to.Di2015NewLine        var asmName = new AssemblyName("DummyAssembly");Di2015NewLine        var ab = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly(asmName, AssemblyBuilderAccess.Run);Di2015NewLine        var mb = ab.DefineDynamicModule("DummyModule");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Define our type.Di2015NewLine        var d = mb.DefineType("DummyType", TypeAttributes.Public);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        const MethodAttributes GetSetAttr = MethodAttributes.Public | MethodAttributes.SpecialName | MethodAttributes.HideBySig;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Define all the fields for the new type.Di2015NewLine        foreach (var rf in reportFields.OrderBy(rf => rf.SelectOrder))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var propertyName = rf.FieldName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var field = d.DefineField("m_" + propertyName, typeof(int), FieldAttributes.Private);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var property = d.DefineProperty(propertyName, PropertyAttributes.HasDefault, typeof(int), null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var dGetAccessor = d.DefineMethod("get_" + propertyName, GetSetAttr, typeof(int), Type.EmptyTypes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var numberGetIl = dGetAccessor.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLine            numberGetIl.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0);Di2015NewLine            numberGetIl.Emit(OpCodes.Ldfld, field);Di2015NewLine            numberGetIl.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var dSetAccessor = d.DefineMethod("set_" + propertyName, GetSetAttr, null, new Type[] { typeof(int) });Di2015NewLine            var numberSetIl = dSetAccessor.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLine            numberSetIl.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0);Di2015NewLine            numberSetIl.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_1);Di2015NewLine            numberSetIl.Emit(OpCodes.Stfld, field);Di2015NewLine            numberSetIl.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            property.SetGetMethod(dGetAccessor);Di2015NewLine            property.SetSetMethod(dSetAccessor);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create the type.Di2015NewLine        var dummyType = d.CreateType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var array = new List<dynamic>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Convert the matrix into the array of the dynamic.Di2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i < size; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var obj = Activator.CreateInstance(dummyType);Di2015NewLine            int j = 0;Di2015NewLine            foreach (var rf in reportFields.OrderBy(rf => rf.SelectOrder))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var type = obj.GetType();Di2015NewLine                var prop = type.GetProperty(rf.FieldName);Di2015NewLine                prop.SetValue(obj, b[j, i], null);Di2015NewLine                j++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            array.Add(obj);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return array;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

15221509Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate bool IsTableSame(DataTable t1, DataTable t2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (t1 == null)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        if (t2 == null)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        if (t1.Rows.Count != t2.Rows.Count)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (t1.Columns.Count != t2.Columns.Count)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (t1.Columns.Cast<DataColumn>().Any(dc => !t2.Columns.Contains(dc.ColumnName)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i <= t1.Rows.Count-1; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (t1.Columns.Cast<DataColumn>().Any(dc1 => t1.Rows[i][dc1.ColumnName].ToString() != t2.Rows[i][dc1.ColumnName].ToString()))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            } Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

((_batteryState & BatteryState.Charging) == BatteryState.Charging);Di2015NewLine  bool critical = ((_batteryState & BatteryState.Critical) == BatteryState.Critical);Di2015NewLine  bool lowbatry = ((_batteryState & BatteryState.Low) == BatteryState.Low);Di2015NewLine  Color c;Di2015NewLine  if (present) {Di2015NewLine    if (charging) {Di2015NewLine      c = Color.Cyan;Di2015NewLine    } else BatteryLevel.Low) {Di2015NewLine      msg += "\\r\\n\\r\\nThe wireless radio will be inactive until it has been charged.";Di2015NewLine    } else if (bad == true) {Di2015NewLine      msg += "\\r\\n\\r\\nThis Application will now close to preserve the device. Please return it to a charging base immediately.";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    MessageBox.Show(msg, "Battery Meter", MessageBoxButtons.OKCancel, MessageBoxIcon.None, 0);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  if (!bad) {Di2015NewLine    StatusPanel.Refresh();Di2015NewLine    // You could signal your app hereDi2015NewLine  } else {Di2015NewLine    // Tell your app this device needs to turn off now.Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return bad;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15229436Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing Microsoft.Practices.Unity.InterceptionExtension;Di2015NewLineusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace InterceptSetterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// See http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ff660871(v=pandp.20).aspxDi2015NewLine    /// See http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ff647107.aspxDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    class SetterCallsFilterMethodBehavior : IInterceptionBehaviorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public IEnumerable<Type> GetRequiredInterfaces()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // we dont need anythingDi2015NewLine            return new[] { typeof(ISomeObject) };Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public IMethodReturn Invoke(IMethodInvocation input, GetNextInterceptionBehaviorDelegate getNext)Di2015NewLine        { // Do not intercept non-setter methodsDi2015NewLine            if (!input.MethodBase.Name.StartsWith("set_"))Di2015NewLine                return getNext()(input, getNext);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            IMethodReturn msg = getNext()(input, getNext);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // post processing. this is where we call filterDi2015NewLine            if (input.Target is ISomeObject)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                (input.Target as ISomeObject).Filter();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return msg;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// We always executeDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public bool WillExecuteDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return true; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15230300Di2015UniqueSeparator  public sealed class RestartableReadStream : StreamDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    private Stream _inner;Di2015NewLine    private List<byte[]> _buffers;Di2015NewLine    private bool _buffering;Di2015NewLine    private int? _currentBuffer = null;Di2015NewLine    private int? _currentBufferPosition = null;Di2015NewLine    public RestartableReadStream(Stream inner)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if (!inner.CanRead) throw new NotSupportedException(); //Don't know what else is being expected of usDi2015NewLine      if (inner.CanSeek) throw new NotSupportedException(); //Just use the underlying streams ability to seek, no need for this classDi2015NewLine      _inner = inner;Di2015NewLine      _buffering = true;Di2015NewLine      _buffers = new List<byte[]>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void StopBuffering()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      _buffering = false;Di2015NewLine      if (!_currentBuffer.HasValue)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        //We aren't currently using the buffersDi2015NewLine        _buffers = null;Di2015NewLine        _currentBufferPosition = null;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Restart()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if (!_buffering) throw new NotSupportedException();  //Buffering got turned off alreadyDi2015NewLine      if (_buffers.Count == 0) return;Di2015NewLine      _currentBuffer = 0;Di2015NewLine      _currentBufferPosition = 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int Read(byte[] buffer, int offset, int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if (_currentBuffer.HasValue)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        //Try to satisfy the read request from the current bufferDi2015NewLine        byte[] rbuffer = _buffers[_currentBuffer.Value];Di2015NewLine        int roffset = _currentBufferPosition.Value;Di2015NewLine        if ((rbuffer.Length - roffset) <= count)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          //Just give them what we have in the current buffer (exhausting it)Di2015NewLine          count = (rbuffer.Length - roffset);Di2015NewLine          for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine            buffer[offset + i] = rbuffer[roffset + i];Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          _currentBuffer++;Di2015NewLine          if (_currentBuffer.Value == _buffers.Count)Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine            //We've stopped reading from the buffersDi2015NewLine            if (!_buffering)Di2015NewLine              _buffers = null;Di2015NewLine            _currentBuffer = null;Di2015NewLine            _currentBufferPosition = null;Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine          return count;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          for (int i = 0; i < count; i++)Di2015NewLine          {Di2015NewLine            buffer[offset + i] = rbuffer[roffset + i];Di2015NewLine          }Di2015NewLine          _currentBufferPosition += count;Di2015NewLine          return count;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      //If we reach here, we're currently using the inner stream. But may be buffering the resultsDi2015NewLine      int ncount = _inner.Read(buffer, offset, count);Di2015NewLine      if (_buffering)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        byte[] rbuffer = new byte[ncount];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < ncount; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          rbuffer[i] = buffer[offset + i];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        _buffers.Add(rbuffer);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      return ncount;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool CanReadDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      get { return true; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool CanSeekDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      get { return false; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool CanWriteDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      get { return false; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //No more interesting code below hereDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void Flush()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override long LengthDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      get { throw new NotSupportedException(); }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override long PositionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      getDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      setDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override long Seek(long offset, SeekOrigin origin)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void SetLength(long value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void Write(byte[] buffer, int offset, int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      throw new NotSupportedException();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

15231990Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class Form1 : FormDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public Form1()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  const int RowCount = 6;Di2015NewLine  const int ColumnCount = 8;Di2015NewLine  private void button1_Click(System.Object sender, System.EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < RowCount; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      for (int j = 0; j < ColumnCount; j++)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        Label lbl = new Label();Di2015NewLine        lbl.Size = new Size(20, 20);Di2015NewLine        lbl.Location = new Point(i * 20, j * 20);Di2015NewLine        lbl.BackColor = (i + j) % 2 == 0 ? 15232646Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class NoLogAttribute : AttributeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15232646Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void PrintProperties(object obj, int indent = 4, char intendCharacter = ' ')Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (obj == null) return;Di2015NewLine        string indentString = new string(intendCharacter, indent);Di2015NewLine        Type objType = obj.GetType();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var pName in GetPropertiesToLogWithCaching(obj))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var property = objType.GetProperty(pName);Di2015NewLine            object propValue = property.GetValue(obj, null);Di2015NewLine            if (property.PropertyType.Assembly == objType.Assembly)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}:", indentString, property.Name);Di2015NewLine                PrintProperties(propValue, indent + 2);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}: {2}", indentString, property.Name, propValue);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }            Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
15232646Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<string> GetPropertiesToLogWithCaching(object obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<string> propertiesToLog = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        if (obj != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string key = obj.GetType().FullName;Di2015NewLine            propertiesToLog = CacheLayer.Get<List<string>>(key);Di2015NewLine            if (propertiesToLog == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                propertiesToLog = GetPropertiesToLog(obj);Di2015NewLine                CacheLayer.Add<List<string>>(propertiesToLog, key);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return propertiesToLog;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static List<string> GetPropertiesToLog(object obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<string> propertiesToLog = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        if (obj != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var p in obj.GetType().GetProperties().Where(prop => !Attribute.IsDefined(prop, typeof(NoLogAttribute))))Di2015NewLine            {                   Di2015NewLine                propertiesToLog.Add(p.Name);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return propertiesToLog;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

15232899Di2015UniqueSeparatorfunction _pointOnLine(line1, line2, pt) {Di2015NewLine    var isValid = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var r = new Microsoft.Maps.Location(0, 0);Di2015NewLine    if (line1.latitude == line2.latitude && line1.longitude == line2.longitude) line1.latitude -= 0.00001;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var U = ((pt.latitude - line1.latitude) * (line2.latitude - line1.latitude)) + ((pt.longitude - line1.longitude) * (line2.longitude - line1.longitude));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var Udenom = Math.pow(line2.latitude - line1.latitude, 2) + Math.pow(line2.longitude - line1.longitude, 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    U /= Udenom;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    r.latitude = line1.latitude + (U * (line2.latitude - line1.latitude));Di2015NewLine    r.longitude = line1.longitude + (U * (line2.longitude - line1.longitude));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var minx, maxx, miny, maxy;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    minx = Math.min(line1.latitude, line2.latitude);Di2015NewLine    maxx = Math.max(line1.latitude, line2.latitude);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    miny = Math.min(line1.longitude, line2.longitude);Di2015NewLine    maxy = Math.max(line1.longitude, line2.longitude);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    isValid = (r.latitude >= minx && r.latitude <= maxx) && (r.longitude >= miny && r.longitude <= maxy);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return isValid ? r : null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15233422Di2015UniqueSeparator//Prompt the user with the list of certificates on the local store.Di2015NewLine//The user have to select the certificate he wants to use for signing.Di2015NewLine//Note: );Di2015NewLinestore.Close();Di2015NewLineX509Certificate2 certificate = null;Di2015NewLineif (certificates.Count != 0)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //The selected certificateDi2015NewLine selecciÃ³n de un certificado";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine//Check certificate's atributes to identify the type of certificate (censored)Di2015NewLineif (certificate.Issuer != SignedXml.XmlDsigNamespaceUrl.ToString());Di2015NewLineelement.InnerText = "comodin";Di2015NewLinexmlDoc.AppendChild(element);Di2015NewLineSignedXml signedXml = new xmlDoc.ChildNodes;Di2015NewLinedataObject.Id = "CONTENT";Di2015NewLinesignedXml.AddObject(dataObject);Di2015NewLineReference reference = new Reference();Di2015NewLinereference.Uri = "#CONTENT";Di2015NewLinesignedXml.AddReference(reference);Di2015NewLine//Attempt to sign the data. 15236857Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class SSLClientDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLinepublic delegate void OnSSLRequestHandler(SSLRequestEvent e);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate string _remoteHost;Di2015NewLineprivate string [] _serverCertFilenames;Di2015NewLineprivate string [] _serverCertPasswords;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic event OnSSLRequestHandler OnLoaded;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic SSLClient(string remoteHost, string [] serverCertFilenames, string [] serverCertPasswords)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    _remoteHost = remoteHost;Di2015NewLine    _serverCertFilenames = serverCertFilenames;Di2015NewLine    _serverCertPasswords = serverCertPasswords;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic bool ValidateServerCertificate(Di2015NewLine      object sender,Di2015NewLine      X509Certificate certificate,Di2015NewLine      X509Chain chain,Di2015NewLine      SslPolicyErrors sslPolicyErrors)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void Load(byte[] sendData, int port = 443)  Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Create a TCP/IP client socket. Di2015NewLine    TcpClient client = new TcpClient(_remoteHost, port);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create an SSL stream utilizing the TcpClientDi2015NewLine    SslStream sslStream = new SslStream(Di2015NewLine        client.GetStream(), Di2015NewLine        false, Di2015NewLine        new RemoteCertificateValidationCallback (ValidateServerCertificate), Di2015NewLine        nullDi2015NewLine    );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    try Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        X509Certificate2Collection xc = new X509Certificate2Collection();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < _serverCertFilenames.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            X509Certificate2 x = new X509Certificate2(Di2015NewLine                _serverCertFilenames[i],Di2015NewLine                _serverCertPasswords[i] );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            xc.Add(x);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        sslStream.AuthenticateAsClient(_remoteHost, xc, SslProtocols.Default, true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (AuthenticationException e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        client.Close();Di2015NewLine        sslStream.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (OnLoaded != null)Di2015NewLine            OnLoaded(new SSLRequestEvent(false, errMsg, null, this));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    sslStream.Write(sendData);Di2015NewLine    sslStream.Flush();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Read message from the server. Di2015NewLine    byte[] response = ReadMessage(sslStream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (OnLoaded != null)Di2015NewLine        OnLoaded(new SSLRequestEvent(true, "Success", response, this));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Close the client connection.Di2015NewLine    client.Close();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate byte[] ReadMessage(SslStream sslStream)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte [] buffer = new byte[1024];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int bytes = -1;Di2015NewLine    doDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bytes = sslStream.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ms.Write(buffer, 0, bytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    } while (bytes != 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return ms.ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15241919Di2015UniqueSeparatorenum ProcessDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Process1,Di2015NewLine    Process2Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static Random _random = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static AutoResetEvent _eventHandle = new AutoResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine    private static volatile Process _selectedProcess = Process.Process1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Thread[] threads = new Thread[10];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < threads.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            threads[i] = new Thread(Method);Di2015NewLine            threads[i].Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _eventHandle.WaitOne();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(_selectedProcess == Process.Process1 ? 15241919Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static Random _random = new Random();Di2015NewLine    private static AutoResetEvent[] _eventHandles = new[] {new AutoResetEvent(false), new AutoResetEvent(false)};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject(_eventHandles[0], Process1, null, Timeout.Infinite, false);Di2015NewLine        ThreadPool.RegisterWaitForSingleObject(_eventHandles[1], Process2, null, Timeout.Infinite, false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Thread[] threads = new Thread[10];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < threads.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            threads[i] = new Thread(Method);Di2015NewLine            threads[i].Start();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Method()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_random.Next()%2 == 0)Di2015NewLine            _eventHandles[0].Set();Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            _eventHandles[1].Set();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Process1(object state, bool timedOut)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Process1");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Process2(object state, bool timedOut)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Process2");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
